Each color flows dynamically across different parts of the logo, as if sculpted from liquid paint. Droplets are suspended in the air around it, enhancing the illusion of movement. Set against a dark background with soft, vivid lighting that accentuates the glossy texture and fluid motion

Usa el color apropiado para los logos.

创作一张照片，展示由四种鲜艳的颜料飞溅（红、蓝、绿、黄）构成的 [BRAND] 标志，捕捉其动态瞬间。每种颜色在标志的不同部分流动，仿佛由液态颜料雕琢而成。周围悬浮着飞溅的液滴，强化动感错觉。背景为深色，配以柔和而鲜明的灯光，突出其光亮质感与流动感。

请根据品牌标志使用合适的颜色。
description: 红蓝绿黄四色液态颜料飞溅构成动态品牌标志，悬浮液滴与深色背景凸显流动质感。

title: 倚靠2026：伦敦暮光中的欢迎
prompts: A hyper-realistic 8k studio photograph featuring a uploaded photo face with 100% matching casually leaning against oversized, three-dimensional block letters spelling "Welcome 2026". The camera is at eye-level, capturing a full-body shot with a slightly wide perspective, emphasizing the scale difference between the person and the text. The person, with an uploaded face as reference, is wearing a peach-colored hoodie with a front pocket, light beige chinos rolled up at the ankles, and brown leather open-toe sandals. They are positioned to the right of the text, with their right arm resting on the top edge of the "E" in "WELCOME" and their left hand casually in their pocket, one leg slightly bent. The large 3D text, rendered with highly detailed textures, has a dark teal/blue extruded side and is filled with a vibrant, hyper-realistic cityscape at dusk, showcasing iconic London landmarks like Big Ben, The Shard, and Tower Bridge, illuminated against an orange and deep blue twilight sky within the letters. The "WELCOME" row is positioned above the "2026" row, both aligned to the left, with the top row reaching approximately the person's chest height. The background is a clean, minimalist, light grey to off-white gradient, brighter at the top and subtly darker towards the bottom. The scene is illuminated with softbox studio lighting, creating even, cinematic lighting with subtle shadows that define the depth of the 3D text and the person's form, ensuring highly detailed texture and crisp focus throughout.

一张超写实的8K影棚摄影作品，画面中人物的脸部与上传的照片100%一致，姿态随意地倚靠在巨大的三维立体字母上，字母拼出“Welcome 2026”。相机位于人物眼睛高度，采用略带广角的视角拍摄全身像，突出人物与文字之间的比例差异。人物脸部以上传照片为参考，身穿桃色连帽衫（带前袋）、浅米色卡其裤（裤脚卷至脚踝）和棕色皮革露趾凉鞋。人物位于文字右侧，右臂搭在“WELCOME”中字母“E”的上边缘，左手随意插在口袋中，一条腿微微弯曲。巨大的3D文字具有高度细节化的纹理，“WELCOME 2026”字母侧面为深青蓝色，内部填充了黄昏时分充满活力且超写实的城市景观，展现伦敦标志性建筑，如大本钟、碎片大厦和伦敦塔桥，在橙色与深蓝色交织的暮光天空下熠熠生辉。文字分为两行，“WELCOME”在上，“2026”在下，左对齐排列，上方一行高度约至人物胸口。背景为干净极简的浅灰至米白色渐变，顶部较亮，底部略暗。整个场景采用柔光箱影棚灯光照明，营造均匀而富有电影感的光线效果，投射出细腻的阴影，凸显3D文字与人物形体的深度，确保整体画面纹理高度精细、焦点清晰锐利。
description: 超写实影棚人像倚靠立体“Welcome 2026”字母，内嵌伦敦黄昏城市景观，光影细腻，质感逼真。

title: MacBook Pro 高端视觉概念
prompts:
Create a 3×3 grid in
3:4 aspect ratio for a high-end commercial marketing campaign using the uploaded product as the central subject.

Each frame must present a distinct visual concept while maintaining perfect product consistency across all nine images.

Grid Concepts (one per cell):

1. Iconic hero still life with bold composition

2. Extreme macro detail highlighting material, surface, or texture

3. Dynamic liquid or particle interaction surrounding the product

4. Minimal sculptural arrangement with abstract forms

5. Floating elements composition suggesting lightness and innovation

6. Sensory close-up emphasizing tactility and realism

7. Color-driven conceptual scene inspired by the product palette

8. Ingredient or component abstraction (non-literal, symbolic)

9. Coffee shop scene combining realism and imagination

Visual Rules:
Product must remain 100% accurate in shape, proportions, label, typography, color, and branding
No distortion, deformation, or redesign of the product
Clean separation between product and background

Lighting & Style:
Soft, controlled studio lighting
Subtle highlights, realistic shadows
High dynamic range, ultra-sharp focus
Editorial luxury advertising aesthetic
Premium sensory marketing look

Overall Feel:
Modern, refined, visually cohesive
High-end commercial campaign
Designed for brand websites, social grids, and digital billboards
Hyperreal, cinematic, polished, and aspirational

为 MacBook Pro 创作一组 3×3 网格图像，采用 3:4 纵横比，用于高端商业营销活动，并以上传的产品作为核心主体。

九张图像中的每一张都必须呈现独特的视觉概念，同时确保产品在所有画面中保持完全一致。

网格概念（每格一个）：

1. 具有大胆构图的标志性英雄静物  
2. 极致微距细节，突出材质、表面或纹理  
3. 产品周围动态液体或粒子互动  
4. 抽象形态构成的极简雕塑式布局  
5. 悬浮元素构图，传达轻盈与创新感  
6. 强调触感与真实感的感官特写  
7. 受产品配色启发的色彩驱动型概念场景  
8. 成分或组件的抽象表现（非写实、象征性）  
9. 融合现实与想象的咖啡馆场景  

视觉规则：  
产品在形状、比例、标签、字体、颜色及品牌标识上必须 100% 准确  
不得对产品进行任何扭曲、变形或重新设计  
产品与背景之间需清晰分离  

光影与风格：

title: 三幕惊变
prompts:
A real-life woman is presented in a vertical triptych collage composition, depicting three consecutive moments (a calm stance, a direct confrontation, and a startled reaction). Each panel deliberately uses left–right offset positioning to create a coherent visual narrative flow.

The image is shot in a photorealistic, cinematic live-action style, high resolution with subtle natural grain, true contrast, hard natural daylight, a clear blue sky, and deep depth of field consistent with real lens behavior. The scene takes place in an open outdoor environment.

The subject wears a cowboy hat, a short-sleeve button-up shirt, and a brownish-red long skirt. Her makeup is retro-inspired, with distinct red lipstick and clearly defined eye makeup.

Top panel:
The subject is positioned toward the right, leaving open sky on the left. She stands with arms crossed, looking toward the lower-left with a surprised expression.
Middle panel:
The subject is positioned toward the left, aiming a firearm with the barrel angled toward the lower-right. Her expression is focused and sharp, and the shot is taken from a slightly top-down angle. In this panel, both the subject and the weapon intentionally break through the top and bottom panel borders, overlapping the frame lines to create a clear layered effect. The middle panel serves as the primary visual focal point.

Bottom panel:
The subject is positioned in the lower-right corner, leaving more negative space on the left. She raises both hands defensively, her eyes naturally widened in surprise, looking toward the upper-left. The subject intentionally breaks the panel frame and overlaps the border lines, forming a distinct layered composition.
The image maintains a 2:3 aspect ratio and a photorealistic live-action style, explicitly avoiding illustration or comic aesthetics.

一位真实女性以垂直三联画拼贴构图呈现，描绘三个连续瞬间（平静站立、正面冲突、惊愕反应）。每个画面刻意采用左右错位布局，以形成连贯的视觉叙事流。

图像采用逼真写实的电影实拍风格，高分辨率，带有细微自然颗粒感、真实对比度、强烈自然日光、清澈蓝天，以及符合真实镜头表现的深景深。场景设定于开阔户外环境。

人物头戴牛仔帽，身穿短袖纽扣衬衫与棕红色长裙。妆容为复古风格，突出红色口红与清晰眼妆。

上画面：  
人物位于右侧，左侧留出大片天空。她双臂交叉站立，目光望向左下方，表情惊讶。

中画面：  
人物位于左侧，手持枪械，枪管指向右下方。表情专注锐利，镜头略带俯视角度。此画面中，人物与武器有意突破上下画格边界，与框线重叠，营造明确的层次效果。中画面作为主要视觉焦点。

下画面：  
人物位于右下角，左侧留出更多负空间。她双手抬起呈防御姿态，双眼自然睁大显露出惊讶神情，目光望向左上方。人物有意突破画格边界，与边框重叠，形成鲜明的层叠构图。

图像保持2:3画幅比例，采用逼真写实的实拍风格，明确避免插画或漫画美学。
description: 真实女性在户外三联画中演绎平静、冲突与惊愕，电影级写实风格与突破边框的构图营造强烈叙事张力。

title: 圣诞纸箱挑战：红酒流淌的节日瞬间
prompts:
Use the face without any  change.A high-quality 2x2 creative photo collage of a young woman with long wavy black hair , posing inside cardboard boxes for a Christmas-themed challenge. She wears a cream, red, and green Fair Isle knit sweater.
Layout & Interaction (Crucial):The right side features a continuous action across two panels. Red wine is poured from the top-right panel and flows vertically down into the bottom-right panel.
Panel Details:

Top Left: She blows artificial snow from her palms towards the camera.
Bottom Left: She holds glowing fairy lights and a red bauble, smiling warmly.
Top Right: She leans on the box edge, holding a wine bottle, pouring red wine downwards so the liquid stream exits the bottom of this frame.
Bottom Right: She is positioned below, holding a wine glass that catches the stream of wine pouring down from the panel above. She is looking up, watching the wine flow into her glass.

Style: Creative box challenge photography, seamless cross-panel interaction, festive mood, soft studio lighting, ultra-realistic textures.

使用原脸不做任何改动。一张高质量的2x2创意照片拼贴，描绘一位长卷黑发的年轻女子，为圣诞主题挑战而置身于纸箱内拍摄。她身穿奶油色、红色与绿色相间的费尔岛针织毛衣。  
布局与互动（关键）：右侧两个画面呈现连续动作——红酒从右上画面倾倒，并垂直流淌至右下画面。  

各画面细节：  
左上：她从掌心向镜头吹出人造雪花。  
左下：她手握发光的 fairy lights 与一颗红色圣诞球，温暖微笑。  
右上：她倚靠在纸箱边缘，手持红酒瓶向下倾倒，酒液从该画面底部流出。  
右下：她位于下方，手持酒杯承接从上方画面流下的红酒，抬头注视着酒液注入杯中。  

风格：创意纸箱挑战摄影，画面间无缝互动，节日氛围，柔光影棚照明，超写实质感。
description: 注意要点：1.人物脸部特征不要发生任何变化（Use the face without any  change）2.右上和右下图有关键连接，而不是独立的。

title: 圣诞奢华商品摄影
prompts:
A luxury Christmas-themed product photoshoot set in a [COZY / STUDIO / OUTDOOR] environment. Place the uploaded product image as the hero object, standing upright at the center of the frame. The product must remain EXACTLY unchanged in [shape, size, material, colors, label design, typography, logos, and all visible text]. Do not modify, recreate, translate, enhance, or stylize any product text.

Scene & background: A festive [BACKGROUND TYPE — e.g. wooden windowsill, velvet studio backdrop, snowy landscape] with [SEASONAL DETAILS — e.g. softly falling snow, blurred Christmas tree lights, winter village bokeh]. Foreground includes subtle holiday accents such as [FESTIVE PROPS — e.g. holly, ribbons, ornaments, fairy lights], placed naturally and never covering the product.

Styling: Optional festive accessory on the product such as [HAT / SCARF / RIBBON], perfectly fitted without altering the product’s structure or covering the label.
Lighting & camera: Warm golden Christmas lighting contrasted with cool winter tones. Soft diffused light, gentle rim lighting for depth, no glare or harsh reflections on the product text. Shallow depth of field with a softly blurred background. Shot on DSLR, [LENS — e.g. 85mm], professional product photography.

Quality & mood: Ultra-high resolution, photorealistic textures, premium holiday advertising aesthetic, clean editorial composition, cozy, elegant, and festive.

一场以圣诞奢华为主题的商品摄影，场景设于[温馨/影棚/户外]环境中。将上传的商品图像作为画面主体，直立置于画面中央。商品必须在[形状、尺寸、材质、颜色、标签设计、字体、标志及所有可见文字]方面保持完全不变。不得对商品上的任何文字进行修改、重绘、翻译、增强或风格化处理。

场景与背景：节日氛围的[背景类型——例如木质窗台、丝绒影棚背景、雪景]，搭配[季节性细节——例如轻柔飘落的雪花、虚化的圣诞树灯、冬日村庄的散景]。前景包含细微的节日装饰元素，如[节日道具——例如冬青、丝带、装饰球、 fairy lights（串灯）]，自然摆放且绝不遮挡商品。

造型：可为商品添加节日配饰，如[帽子/围巾/丝带]，需完美贴合，不得改变商品结构或遮盖标签。

灯光与镜头：温暖金色的圣诞灯光与冷调冬日色调形成对比。采用柔和漫射光，辅以柔和轮廓光营造层次感，确保商品文字无眩光或强烈反光。浅景深，背景柔焦虚化。使用单反相机拍摄，[镜头——例如85mm]，专业商品摄影风格。

画质与氛围：超高清分辨率，逼真质感，高端节日广告美学，干净利落的编辑构图，温馨、优雅且充满节日气息。

title: Pantheon: Classical Architectural Presentation
prompts:
An expert architectural illustrator's presentation board for a traditional Japanese ryokan-style residence featuring Sukiya-zukuri architecture—deep hipped roofs with clay tiles, exposed timber framing, shoji screens, engawa verandahs, and tatami rooms opening onto a garden with a koi pond, tea house, and pruned pines.
The canvas flows left to right: black and white 2D drawings (Site Plan, Floor Plans) on the left, Elevations and a Cross-Section through the main hall in the center, and a photorealistic 3D render at golden hour on the right—warm light through maple leaves, reflections on water.
Unified aesthetic blending sumi ink linework with washi paper textures. Warm greys and indigo for technical drawings transitioning to autumn colours for the render. Title block reads 'YAMATO SERENITY RESIDENCE' in kanji and English.

An expert architectural illustrator's presentation board for an ancient Roman temple featuring a massive unreinforced concrete dome with central oculus, Corinthian portico with granite columns, and bronze doors. The canvas flows left to right: black and white 2D drawings (Site Plan, Floor Plans) on the left, Elevations and Cross-Section in the center, and a photorealistic 3D render at noon with a beam of light streaming through the oculus on the right. Unified aesthetic blending classical engraving linework with travertine and bronze textures. Warm sepia tones transitioning to cream, terracotta, and soft gold. Title block reads 'PANTHEON'.

An expert architectural illustrator's presentation board for a Romanesque Revival fairy-tale castle featuring turrets, pointed towers, arched galleries, frescoed interiors, and dramatic clifftop positioning above forested valleys. The canvas flows left to right: black and white 2D drawings (Site Plan, Floor Plans) on the left, Elevations and Cross-Section in the center, and a photorealistic 3D render in winter with snow-dusted peaks and pine forests on the right. Unified aesthetic blending medieval manuscript linework with limestone textures. Ink wash tones transitioning to ice blue, evergreen, and warm stone. Title block reads 'NEUSCHWANSTEIN'.

An expert architectural illustrator's presentation board for a neo-futurist supertall skyscraper featuring a bundled tube structure, Y-shaped floor plan, setback terraces, aluminium and glass cladding, and desert-flower-inspired geometry. The canvas flows left to right: black and white 2D drawings (Site Plan, Floor Plans) on the left, Elevations and Cross-Section in the center, and a photorealistic 3D render at night with the tower illuminated against a starry sky on the right. Unified aesthetic blending sleek technical linework with reflective glass textures. Steel grey tones transitioning to midnight blue, silver, and warm LED gold. Title block reads 'BURJ KHALIFA'.
description: A harmonious blend of classical linework and photorealistic render showcasing the Pantheon’s grandeur, from plans to oculus-lit dome.

title: 一副完整的 78 张塔罗牌
prompts:
4K像素，16:9宽高比，13x6 的塔罗牌插图，风格统一而精致，灵感源自新艺术运动，并融合了现代优雅。浓郁饱满的色彩，包括深红、皇家紫、古金、宝石蓝、翠绿、暖琥珀、灰玫瑰和象牙白，与古旧的羊皮纸和深邃的午夜背景相得益彰。精细的线条、流畅的有机曲线、细致的植物元素以及奢华的金箔点缀贯穿始终。人物优雅动人，比例匀称，面部表情生动传神，头发飘逸，衣褶飘逸，对织物的动态刻画入木三分。风格参考：阿尔丰斯·穆夏的风格与经典的莱德-韦特塔罗牌象征主义以及当代奇幻插画（詹姆斯·吉恩、维克托·恩盖）的融合。每张牌都饰以华丽的镀金新艺术风格边框，边框上点缀着交织的藤蔓、星空图案和神圣几何图形。
所有卡片均采用一致的元素：戏剧性的明暗对比营造出深度和立体感，丰富的阴影以互补的宝石色调呈现，仿旧艺术纸的纹理带有微妙的龟裂感，散发出仿佛由内而外的光泽，背景展现出精细的建筑元素或郁郁葱葱的自然景观，并具有良好的透视效果，象征性物体以一丝不苟的细节和逼真的纹理绘制而成。反复出现的主题包括：精致的花卉边框、带有面孔的天体、飘逸的丝带和神圣几何图案。
description: 一个提示词生成一副完整的 78 张塔罗牌

title: 反乌托邦文学微缩剧场
prompts:
2x2 grid, each with a consistent photoreal studio macro style book.

Panel 2: “Brave New World” as a sterile cutaway hardcover factory-lab diorama with glass vials, conveyor belts, chrome surfaces, and a mechanical “watching eye” lens on the back wall.

Sujetos (Autogeneración Histórica): Selecciona y renderiza con precisión fotográfica los 5 objetos tecnológicos o de cultura pop más icónicos lanzados específicamente en [AÑO]. Incluye 5-7 accesorios menores correspondientes a la época (cables, medios de almacenamiento, papelería o dulces retro).

下面是有着日式瓦顶房屋的大城市，周围是郁郁葱葱的绿树，城市中心有一座高山。氛围明亮清晰，阳光柔和，飘着淡淡的云彩。
视角是从上面往下看，带有温暖明亮的情绪。
色彩鲜艳，服装和皮肤逼真，细节丰富，真实的摄影风格，电影级光照，焦点锐利，8K分辨率。使用与上传参考照片完全相同的面部，保持相同的眼睛、嘴唇、鼻子、下颌线条、肤色和自然瑕疵。不进行AI平滑处理，不改变身份或表情。保留真实的毛孔、纹理和逼真的光照效果，定义明确的瘦削下颌线条，自然锐利的特征，没有肿胀或浮肿的外观，真实的柔软皮肤纹理。超现实的8K电影级肖像，单反相机的清晰度，真实的人类皮肤纹理，可见毛孔和柔和的汗液光泽，0%的AI或塑料外观，基于场景（黄金时段或柔和的日光）的自然阳光或环境光，准确的阴影匹配光线方向，平衡的色彩分级与温和对比度和暖色调皮肤，背景虚化（散景），眼睛和织物上的真实反射，不过度平滑或修饰皮肤，头发细节自然，身体比例准确（身高5'2"，健康聪明的体型），Instagram 4:5的比例，左上角有“ZK”签名，微妙优雅的闭嘴微笑。身体和脸部完美匹配…移除脸部笑容……
description: 主角与哆啦A梦头戴竹蜻蜓，在日式城市上空欢快飞行，阳光明媚，色彩鲜活，细节逼真如电影画面。

title: 房屋改造前后对比视频教程
prompts:
Creating a renovation transformation video takes just three steps:

1. Find a photo of the house before renovation
Choose a clear image that shows the structure and layout of the space (unfinished, old, or unrenovated).
Use Nano Banana Pro to generate the renovated version
2. Based on the original photo, generate a visually upgraded “after renovation” image with the desired style and materials.
3. Use Kling’s first-and-last-frame feature to generate the video
Set the “before renovation” image as the first frame and the “after renovation” image as the last frame, and let Kling automatically create a smooth renovation transition video.

制作一段改造前后对比视频只需三个步骤：

1. 找一张房屋改造前的照片  
选择一张清晰展示空间结构和布局的图片（未完工、老旧或未翻新的状态）。  
使用 Nano Banana Pro 生成翻新后的版本。  

2. 基于原始照片，生成一张视觉升级的“翻新后”图像，包含理想风格与材质。  

3. 使用 Kling 的首尾帧功能生成视频  
将“翻新前”的图片设为第一帧，“翻新后”的图片设为最后一帧，Kling 将自动生成一段流畅的改造过渡视频。
description: 三步生成惊艳房屋翻新对比视频，旧貌换新颜一目了然。

title: 粘土童趣角色模型
prompts:
Create a stylized miniature model of [CHARACTERS] shaped entirely from soft polymer clay. The figure has rounded, childlike anatomy — large head, small body, and simplified details that feel friendly and handcrafted. Its outfit and accessories match [CHARACTERS]’ iconic look, modeled with smooth curves and lively, saturated tones.
The material appears dry and tactile, with a powdery matte finish and subtle surface texture—avoid gloss, shine, or reflections. Lighting should be gentle and even, wrapping softly around the form with faint ambient shading to reveal volume.
Present the figurine standing upright, slightly turned toward the right, framed in a minimal off-white environment with a smooth floor and faint contact shadow beneath. The overall composition feels calm, neat, and balanced—like a clay sculpture photographed for a design catalog.
Format: square 1080x1080”

创作一个完全由软质聚合物粘土制成的[CHARACTERS]风格化微型模型。该人偶具有圆润、童趣的造型——大头、小身体，细节简化，呈现出亲切的手工感。其服装与配饰忠实还原[CHARACTERS]的经典造型，采用流畅曲线和鲜明饱和的色彩塑造。材质呈现干燥且富有触感的哑光粉质感，表面带有细微纹理——避免任何光泽、反光或高光。光线应柔和均匀，轻柔地包裹形体，并辅以微弱的环境阴影以展现体积感。将人偶以直立姿态呈现，略微向右转，置于极简的米白色环境中，地面平滑，底部带有淡淡的接触阴影。整体构图宁静、整洁、平衡，如同为设计图录拍摄的粘土雕塑作品。格式：正方形 1080x1080”
description: 圆润可爱的软质粘土人偶，还原经典角色造型，哑光质感与柔和光线营造宁静手作氛围。

title: 金属质感品牌雕塑
prompts: A hyper-realistic 3D render of a metallic sculpture shaped as the official [BRAND] logo. The sculpture is crafted from richly brushed metal in [BRAND]'s signature color(s), with subtle gradients and a mirror-polished surface that reflects its surroundings with precise clarity. Captured in ultra-high resolution with macro depth of field, Canon EOS R5, 85mm f/1.4 lens simulation. —no-human —no-text —no-blur —no-distortion —no-lowres —no-overexposure. 1080x1080 dimension.

title: 1983科技发明Knolling摄影
prompts:
Do this for 1983 > You are a Professional Product Photographer specializing in knolling Flat Lay photography. I will provide a Year or inventor. Step 1: The Selection.  > Identify 3 to 5 inventions from that year, plus 5-7 smaller related accessories (e.g., if the invention is a camera, include film rolls; if it's a car part, include a wrench).   

Step 2: The Layout. Arrange all items on a flat, solid-colored matte background (choose a color that contrasts well with the items). 

The Grid: Align everything at perfect 90-degree angles. Organize them by size and shape. 

The Vibe: Deconstructed, organized, satisfying, geometric. 

The Lighting:

Soft, flat, overhead studio lighting (shadowless).

Output:

 A single 4:5 image.

The Year (e.g., "1955") should be arranged using physical typography (like metal letters or cut paper) placed in the center of the grid. 

Style: Wes Anderson symmetry, high-end commercial advertising, vibrant.

提示：请为1983年执行以下操作 > 你是一位专业产品摄影师，专精于Knolling平铺摄影。我将提供一个年份或发明家。  
第一步：选品 > 挑选该年份的3至5项发明，并搭配5到7件相关的小配件（例如，若发明是相机，则包括胶卷；若是汽车零件，则包括扳手）。

第二步：布局 > 将所有物品摆放在纯色哑光平面上（选择与物品形成鲜明对比的背景色）。

网格：所有物品严格以90度直角对齐，按尺寸与形状有序排列。

氛围：解构感、井然有序、令人满足、几何感强。

灯光：柔和、均匀、顶置影棚灯光（无阴影）。

输出：一张4:5比例的图像。

年份（如“1983”）需使用实体字型（如金属字母或剪纸字体）置于网格中央。

风格：韦斯·安德森式对称构图、高端商业广告感、色彩鲜明。
description: 以韦斯·安德森式对称构图，呈现1983年标志性科技产品与配件的极简平铺摄影，色彩鲜明、秩序井然。

title: 梅西收藏家遗物套盒
prompts:
do this for Messi: 
Relic-Loadout Kit

遗物装备套装

title: 修复NotebookLM幻灯片字体崩坏
prompts:
一个提示词修复Notebooklm幻灯片中文字体崩坏。
Notebooklm 真的是一个神级知识学习工具，生成的幻灯片质量也非常高，但有一个痛点：生成的幻灯片图片是1K（1376*768），中文正文小字细节笔画会崩坏，虽然能认出来但是展示起来非常不美观。经过测试找到一个修复的方式：要将图片下载后在Gemini中用提示词“请将该图片用最高分辨率重新生成，修复文字错误”重新生成，然后点击图片右上角图标下载高清版。这样可以得到2K版，画面几乎看不出差别，中文字体清晰度得到极大改善，崩坏的情况几乎没有了，大家可以放大两张图片看对比。
description: 通过AI高清重绘，解决NotebookLM中文小字崩坏问题，提升幻灯片清晰度。

title: 奢华皮革旅行包
prompts: [BRAND NAME] luxury leather duffle bag, high-end editorial studio photograph. The duffle bag, designed with a unique, unconventional color palette and unexpected patterns or graphics relevant to [BRAND NAME], is suspended against a seamless, soft pastel studio background with gentle, diffused lighting. The premium pebbled leather texture is prominent, with [BRAND NAME] logos and signature motifs integrated into the design. Polished metal hardware and a small leather luggage tag are visible. The scene is lit with professional softbox lighting, creating soft shadows and highlights. Shot with a shallow depth of field, the bag is in sharp focus. title: iPhone 17 Pro 概念广告九宫格
prompts:
Unofficial ad concept for iPhone 17 Pro 📸

Prompt💬: 

Create a 3×3 grid in
3:4 aspect ratio for a high-end commercial marketing campaign using the uploaded product as the central subject.

Each frame must present a distinct visual concept while maintaining perfect product consistency across all nine images.

Grid Concepts (one per cell):

1. Iconic hero still life with bold composition

2. Extreme macro detail highlighting material, surface, or texture

3. Dynamic liquid or particle interaction surrounding the product

4. Minimal sculptural arrangement with abstract forms

5. Floating elements composition suggesting lightness and innovation

6. Sensory close-up emphasizing tactility and realism

7. Color-driven conceptual scene inspired by the product palette

8. Ingredient or component abstraction (non-literal, symbolic)

9. Surreal yet elegant fusion scene combining realism and imagination

Visual Rules:
Product must remain 100% accurate in shape, proportions, label, typography, color, and branding
No distortion, deformation, or redesign of the product
Clean separation between product and background

Lighting & Style:
Soft, controlled studio lighting
Subtle highlights, realistic shadows
High dynamic range, ultra-sharp focus
Editorial luxury advertising aesthetic
Premium sensory marketing look

Overall Feel:
Modern, refined, visually cohesive
High-end commercial campaign
Designed for brand websites, social grids, and digital billboards
Hyperreal, cinematic, polished, and aspirational

iPhone 17 Pro 非官方广告概念 📸

提示词💬：

以3:4的画幅比例创建一个3×3网格，用于高端商业营销活动，将上传的产品作为九宫格中央的核心主体。

每个格子必须呈现独特的视觉概念，同时在全部九张图像中保持产品的一致性。

网格概念（每格一个）：

6. 强调触感与真实感的感官特写  
7. 受产品配色启发的色彩主导概念场景  
8. 成分或组件的抽象表现（非写实、象征性）  
9. 融合现实与想象的超现实优雅场景  

视觉规则：

不得对产品进行任何扭曲、变形或重新设计  
产品与背景需清晰分离

柔和可控的影棚灯光

呈现高级感官营销的视觉质感  

整体氛围：  
现代、精致、视觉统一  
适用于高端商业广告活动  
专为品牌官网、社交媒体九宫格及数字广告牌设计  
超写实、电影感、精雕细琢且富有向往感

title: 架构之美：信息的蓝图
prompts:
你是一位世界级的演示文稿设计师和故事讲述者。你创作的幻灯片在视觉上令人震撼、极其精美，并能有效地传达复杂的信息。你的特点是：既精通设计，又极具讲故事的天赋。

你制作的幻灯片能根据源素材和目标受众进行调整。凡事皆有故事，而你要找到最佳的讲述方式。你结合了顶尖设计师的创造力与专业知识。

本幻灯片主要设计用于**阅读和分享**。其结构应当不言自明，即便没有演讲者也能轻松理解。叙事逻辑和所有有用的数据都应包含在幻灯片的文本和视觉元素中。幻灯片应包含足够的语境，以便任何视觉图像都能被独立理解。如果有助于叙事，你可以添加某些包含更密集信息（从源素材中提取）的幻灯片。

你现在正在为下述幻灯片演示编写一份**大纲**。

我们将把这份大纲提供给一位专家级设计师，由其制作最终的实际演示文稿。

幻灯片内容应使用中文。占位符应保留中文。

**首先**，在编写幻灯片大纲之前，你必须根据内容主题和用户请求生成一个全局性的**风格指令（STYLE INSTRUCTIONS）**块。这应该被包裹在代码块中。

<STYLE_INSTRUCTION_EXAMPLE>
Design Aesthetic: 一种受建筑蓝图和高端技术期刊启发的干净、精致、极简主义的编辑风格。整体感觉是精准、清晰和充满智慧的优雅。
Background Color: 一种微妙的、有纹理的灰白色，十六进制代码 #F8F7F5，让人联想到高质量的绘图纸。
Primary Font: Neue Haas Grotesk Display Pro。用于所有幻灯片标题和主要标题。应使用粗体渲染，以增强冲击力和清晰度。
Secondary Font: Tiempos Text。用于所有正文、副标题和注释。其高可读性和经典感与干净的无衬线标题形成专业的对比。
Color Palette:
Primary Text Color: 深板岩灰，#2F3542。
Primary Accent Color (用于高光、图表和关键元素): 充满活力的智能蓝，#007AFF。
Visual Elements:
一致使用精细、准确的线条、示意图和干净的矢量图形。视觉效果是概念性和抽象的，旨在阐述想法而非描绘写实场景。布局空间感强且结构化，优先考虑信息层级和可读性。不包含页码、页脚、Logo 或页眉。
</STYLE_INSTRUCTION_EXAMPLE>

使用以下结构作为模板，但要根据具体的叙事动态调整美学、字体和颜色：

```markdown
你是架构师（The Architect），一个旨在将指令可视化为高端蓝图风格数据展示的精密 AI。你的输出是精确、分析性且美学上精美的。

**核心指令 (CORE DIRECTIVES):**

1. 分析用户提示词的结构、意图和关键要素。

2. 将指令转化为干净、结构化的视觉隐喻（蓝图、展示图、原理图）。

3. 使用特定的、克制的调色板和字体系列，以获得最大的清晰度和专业影响力。

4. 所有视觉输出必须严格保持 16:9 的长宽比。

5. 以三联画（triptych）或基于网格的布局呈现信息，保持文本和视觉的平衡。

**风格指令 (STYLE INSTRUCTIONS):**
Design Aesthetic: [描述整体风格，例如：极简主义、俏皮、商务、建筑风格等]
Background Color: [描述及十六进制代码]
Primary Font: [标题字体名称]
Secondary Font: [正文字体名称]
Color Palette:
Primary Text Color: [十六进制代码]
Primary Accent Color: [十六进制代码]
Visual Elements: [描述线条、形状、图像风格、摄影与矢量的使用等]

**绘制内容 (CONTENT TO DRAW):**

```

对于本次特定的幻灯片演示，我们需要内容侧重于：
{Custom Prompt, 描述你想要创建的幻灯片，默认为：添加高层级大纲，或引导受众、风格和重点："为初学者创建一个风格大胆且俏皮的演示文稿，重点在于分步说明。"}

我们在下方还附上了一些针对本幻灯片的制作人说明，这将有助于指导演示文稿的整体结构和叙事。

请记住以下大纲编写规则：

* 专注于演示文稿的大纲以及每张幻灯片应涵盖的内容。
* 每张幻灯片的描述必须全面且结构严谨。
* **第 1 页必须是封面页，最后一页必须是封底页。** 请注意，这两张幻灯片的视觉风格和布局应与内部内容页截然不同（例如，使用“海报式”布局、醒目的排版或满版出血图像），以设定基调并提供强有力的结尾。
* 对于每一张幻灯片，你必须严格按照以下 4 个部分输出内容：
// NARRATIVE GOAL (叙事目标)
(解释这张幻灯片在整个故事弧光中的具体叙事目的)
// KEY CONTENT (关键内容)
(列出标题、副标题和正文/要点。每一个具体数据点都必须能追溯到源材料。)
// VISUAL (视觉画面)
(描述支持该观点所需的图像、图表、图形或抽象视觉元素。)
// LAYOUT (布局结构)
(描述构图、层级、空间安排或焦点。)
* 保留源素材中的关键要素。
* 每一个具体的数据点...都必须能直接追溯到源素材。
* 所有细节都需要提及，因为设计师之后将无法访问源内容。
* 永远假设听众比你想象的更专业、更感兴趣、更聪明。

**至关重要 (CRITICAL):**

* **生成的幻灯片切勿超过 20 页。**
* 避免使用“标题：副标题”的格式作为标题；这种格式显得非常有 AI 感。相反，应通过**叙事性的主题句**将整个演示文稿串联起来。
* 明确避免陈词滥调的“AI 废话（AI slop）”模式。切勿使用诸如“不仅仅是 [X]，而是 [Y]”之类的短语。
* 使用直接、自信、主动的人类语言。
* 切勿包含任何供作者插入姓名、日期等的占位符幻灯片。
* 切勿要求包含知名人物的逼真照片。
* **切勿以通用的“有任何问题吗？”或“谢谢”幻灯片结尾。** 相反，封底应为经过设计的结束语、有意义的引用或强有力的视觉总结，以此锚定整个叙事。
description: 探索如何将复杂的信息转化为视觉上令人震撼的演示文稿。通过精心设计的蓝图风格幻灯片，让每一个数据点都讲述其独特的故事。

prompts: A hyper-real aerial photograph of a colossal, wind-eroded adobe fortress shaped like the Arabic letter “م”, each stroke formed by stepped kasbah walls and narrow parapet walkways, with carved geometric reliefs and sand-choked archways embedded into the curves. Endless dunes swallow the lower courtyards, a thin caravan line of camels and tiny robed figures crosses the base for scale, golden-hour sunlight with long shadows, dust haze, ultra-detailed mudbrick texture, photoreal, filmic color grade, 24mm wide-angle.
提示：一张超写实的航拍照片，展现一座巨大而风蚀的土坯堡垒，其外形酷似阿拉伯字母“م”，每一笔画均由阶梯状的卡斯巴城墙与狭窄的城垛步道构成，曲线中嵌入雕刻的几何浮雕与沙尘堵塞的拱门。无尽沙丘吞没了下方的庭院，一支细长的骆驼商队与微小的长袍人影横穿基座以提供比例参照，金色时刻的阳光投下长长的阴影，空气中弥漫着尘雾，泥砖纹理极度精细，照片级真实感，电影级色彩调校，24毫米广角镜头。
description: 一座形如阿拉伯字母“م”的巨型土坯堡垒，嵌于无垠沙丘，金色阳光下尽显风蚀肌理与几何浮雕，骆驼商队点缀其间，超写实航拍视角。

title: Y2K海滩双视
prompts:
“垂直分屏拼贴（2格网格）。”  
“上格：中近景，正面视角，双手与镜头互动。”  
“下格：中景，背面/侧脸视角，回头看向镜头。”  
“一致性：两格中为同一人物、同一服装、同一时间段。”

人物细节：  
- 人种年龄：年轻亚洲女性，肤色白皙，深棕色齐耳短发，带有被风吹拂的质感。  
- 服饰：  
  - 泳装：黑色挂脖式比基尼上衣，颈部交叉绑带。  
  - 配饰：左手佩戴厚重红色数码运动手表，左手中指戴银色戒指，佩戴长款垂坠银色耳环。

精确姿势与解剖细节：  
- 上格姿势：  
  - 朝向：正面朝向镜头。  
  - 动作：身体微微前倾，双前臂伸向镜头（透视缩短）。  
  - 双手：掌心向上微张（呈捧接状），仿佛在接雨或递送某物。  
  - 表情：甜美亲切的微笑，直视镜头。  
  - 头部倾斜：略微向右偏斜。  

- 下格姿势：  
  - 朝向：人物背对镜头（背面/侧脸），身体向左偏转45度。  
  - 头部转向：头部越过左肩回望镜头。  
  - 左臂：肘部弯曲，手抬至肩高。  
  - 左手：食指向上或侧方指，其余手指微曲。  
  - 表情：柔和自然，略比上格更严肃或更具魅力。

摄影技术参数：  
- 拍摄技法：直闪摄影（机顶闪光灯风格）。  
- 视觉风格：90年代/Y2K快照美学。  
- 焦距：35mm（中等广角）。  
- 光圈：f/4.0（主体清晰，背景海面轻微虚化）。  
- 快门速度：1/30秒（慢速快门捕捉环境日落色彩，闪光灯凝固主体）。  
- 感光度：ISO 400。

光线与环境：  
- 地点：黄昏时分的海滩海岸线。  
- 背景元素：海浪拍岸、湿润沙滩、地平线。  
- 布光方案：混合光源——前景由冷/中性直闪照亮，背景由柔和环境日落光照明（暖橙色地平线渐变为紫/蓝色天空）。  
- 对比度：明亮主体与较暗傍晚背景之间形成高对比。
description: 90年代快照风格，年轻亚洲女性在黄昏海滩上以双视角展现一致角色魅力，直闪与日落交织出高对比Y2K美学。

title: 雨中离别：九格电影分镜
prompts: Create a 9-panel cinematic storyboard set in a rainy, melancholic atmosphere. Show a young woman in a soaked dress standing beneath stone arches as a man walks away into the rain. Include close-ups of her emotional expression, a moment of their hands parting, shots of her crying against a pillar, and a final wide shot of her standing alone. Use soft, moody lighting, blue-gray tones, shallow depth of field, and dramatic raindrops. Panels should feel emotional, poetic, and film-like
提示：创作一组9格电影分镜，设定在阴雨连绵、忧郁的氛围中。画面中，一位身穿湿透长裙的年轻女子站在石拱门下，一名男子渐行渐远，消失在雨中。包含她情绪化表情的特写、两人双手分离的瞬间、她倚靠石柱哭泣的镜头，以及最后一幕她独自伫立的广角镜头。采用柔和而富有情绪的光影、蓝灰色调、浅景深和富有戏剧性的雨滴效果。各分镜应充满情感、诗意且具有电影感。
description: 阴雨绵绵下，女子目送爱人远去，九格画面诉说忧伤与孤独，蓝灰调光影交织诗意电影感。

title: 俏皮兔女郎的闪光自拍
prompts:
“prompt_description”：  
- 主体：  
  - 外貌：肤色白皙的年轻女性，留着长而直的黑发。妆容为“可爱”风格，脸颊涂有粉色腮红，嘴唇有光泽。  
  - 服装：经典黑色兔女郎装。黑色缎面无肩带连体衣（紧身衣），心形领口；黑色透明连裤袜/紧身裤。配饰包括大型黑色蕾丝兔耳头箍、白色项圈配黑色蝴蝶结领结，以及手腕处的白色法式袖口。右腕佩戴一串珠链手镯。  
  - 环境：室内家居场景。站在一扇浅色木门前，门上有银色把手。左侧可见一面白墙，墙上部分露出一张黄色海报或艺术作品。

- 技术风格：抓拍快照美学，直打闪光灯摄影，网红社交媒体风格，高调明亮。

“pose_specs”：  
- 身体姿势：正面站立，画面在大腿处截断（中景）。  
- 手臂：双臂抬起，肘部向两侧弯曲，双手靠近脸部，食指轻戳脸颊。  
- 头部：正对镜头，眼睛闭上或向下看，神情俏皮。嘴唇噘起呈“亲吻”或吹口哨状。  
- 表情：俏皮可爱，“撒娇卖萌”（aegyo）姿势。

“camera_settings”：  
- 视角：平视高度。  
- 焦距：28mm 至 35mm（智能手机广角镜头风格）。  
- 光圈：f/1.8 至 f/2.8。  
- 快门速度：1/60 秒（与闪光同步）。  
- ISO：400。  
- 构图：居中构图，画面从大腿中部至兔耳上方。

“lighting_setup”：  
- 光源类型：机顶直打闪光灯。  
- 光质：硬光，正面光源，贴近镜头轴线。  
- 阴影：主体后方木门上可见清晰、硬朗的投影，表明闪光灯安装在相机上或非常靠近相机。  
- 色温：闪光灯白平衡（约 5500K），混合略暖的室内环境光。
description: 白皙少女身着经典兔女郎装，在木门前摆出撒娇姿势，直打闪光灯营造出高调网红自拍风格。

prompts: A film-like fisheye wide-angle 360-degree selfie without any camera or phone visible in the subject’s hands. A real and exaggerated selfie of [person from uploaded image] with [CHARACTERS]. They are making faces at the camera.
一张胶片般的鱼眼360度广角自拍，拍摄者手中没有任何相机或手机。一张真实且夸张的[上传图片中的人物]与[角色]的自拍。他们对着镜头做鬼脸。

A hyper-realistic fisheye wide-angle selfie, captured with a vintage 35mm fisheye lens creating heavy barrel distortion. without any camera or phone visible in the subject’s hands.
Subject & Action: A close-up, distorted group photo featuring [Person From Uploaded Image] taking selfie with [CHARACTERS]. Everyone is making wild, exaggerated faces, squinting slightly from the flash.
Lighting & Texture: Harsh, direct on-camera flash lighting that creates hard shadows behind the subjects. Authentic film grain, slight motion blur on the edges, and chromatic aberration. It looks like a candid, amateur snapshot as if captured during a chaotic behind-the-scenes moment, not a studio photo.

一张超写实的广角鱼眼自拍，使用复古35毫米鱼眼镜头拍摄，造成了严重的枪管畸变。拍摄对象手中没有任何相机或手机。
主题与动作：一张特写、扭曲的集体照，照片中[上传图片中的人物]与[角色]自拍。每个人都做出夸张的表情，闪光灯让他微微眯眼。
灯光与质感：强烈、直接的闪光灯光，在主体背后形成硬阴影。真实的胶片颗粒感，边缘轻微的运动模糊，以及色差。看起来像是一张业余的快照，仿佛是在混乱的幕后时刻拍摄的，而非摄影棚照片。
description: 真实人物与角色在360度鱼眼镜头下搞怪自拍，无设备却充满胶片质感的奇幻瞬间。

title: 班尼迪克蛋微缩厨房珍藏盒
prompts:
do this for eggs benedict :

  
Input A is a famous dish (photo or dish name).
Analyze the cuisine's origin country, there person who invented it or said to have, traditional preparation, cultural significance, and key ingredients.
Optional Input B is a style reference (culinary museum / artisan packaging). If missing, choose Michelin-star plating aesthetic meets toy packaging.
Goal: Premium clear acrylic box containing a miniature kitchen scene with the figurine of the person who invented it preparing the dish, surrounded by ingredient compartments like a high-end spice collection.
Rules:
- Center: tiny kitchen setup with chef mid-preparation
- 10-15 individual compartments with micro versions of each ingredient
- Include miniature cooking tools specific to the dish
- Add a tiny "origin map" showing the dish's birthplace
- Packaging uses colors from the cuisine's flag or traditional pottery
- Label with dish name in both English and origin language, show the date it first started
Output: ONE image, 4:5 artisan food photography style

输入A是一个著名的菜肴（照片或菜肴名称）。
分析该菜肴的起源国家、据说发明它的人、传统制作方法、文化意义和关键成分。
可选输入B是风格参考（烹饪博物馆/手工包装）。如果缺失，则选择米其林星级摆盘美学与玩具包装相结合。
目标：一个高级透明亚克力盒子，内含一个微型厨房场景，里面有发明者的雕像正在准备这道菜，周围是由如高端香料收藏般的小隔间环绕。
规则：
- 中心：微小厨房设置，厨师正处于准备过程中
- 10-15个独立的小隔间，每个隔间内有微缩版的每种成分
- 包括特定于这道菜的迷你烹饪工具
- 添加一张小小的“起源地图”，显示这道菜的诞生地
- 包装使用来自该菜肴国旗或传统陶器的颜色
- 标签上用英文和原产地语言标明菜肴名称，显示开始日期
输出：一张图片，4:5手工艺食品摄影风格。 

对于班尼迪克蛋：
输入A是一道著名的菜肴（班尼迪克蛋的照片或名称）。
分析该菜肴的起源国家、据说发明它的厨师或人、传统制作方法、文化意义和关键成分。
目标是创建一个高质量的透明亚克力盒，内部展示的是一个微型厨房场景，包括制作者的小雕像正在准备班尼迪克蛋，以及由像高端香料收藏那样的小格子围绕的成分。
description: 透明亚克力盒内，微型厨房重现班尼迪克蛋诞生时刻，香料格陈列关键食材，附起源地图与双语标签。

title: Gemini Nano Banana Pro
时尚概念手绘分解图
prompts:
A fashion-style concept breakdown sheet in hand-drawn illustration style. 
Center: full-body view of a stylish, confident female character with a slightly sexy vibe (not explicit), in a dynamic yet natural pose. 
Surrounding: structured layout of her key components:
• Clothing layering – show outerwear, innerwear, tights (lace, sheer textures), shapewear with detailed pattern zoom-ins.  
• Expression sheet – 3-4 facial expressions (neutral, shy, surprised, focused).
• Close-up zooms – textures of fabric folds, skin details, hand gestures.
• Lifestyle & accessories – open handbag with daily items: lipstick, perfume, mirror compact, hand cream, diary, supplements.
• Material annotations – handwritten-style notes beside each item (e.g., “soft lace,” “matte leather,” “shade #520”).

Background: soft beige or parchment paper texture to evoke a design sketchbook.
Lighting: clean, soft shadows to unify the scene.
Output: high-quality 2D illustration in 4K, balanced between sensuality and fashion editorial.
Language: labels in Chinese + English.

手绘风格的时尚概念分解图。  
中央：一位时尚自信、略带性感气质（非露骨）的女性角色全身像，姿态动感自然。  
周围：结构化布局展示其关键组成部分：  
• 服装层次——展示外套、内搭、连裤袜（蕾丝、透明材质）、塑身衣，并附有细节图案放大图。  
• 表情图——3至4种面部表情（中性、害羞、惊讶、专注）。  
• 局部特写——布料褶皱纹理、皮肤细节、手势特写。  
• 生活方式与配饰——打开的手提包内含日常用品：口红、香水、粉饼镜、护手霜、日记本、保健品。  
• 材质标注——每项物品旁配有手写风格注释（例如：“柔软蕾丝”、“哑光皮革”、“色号#520”）。  

背景：柔和米色或羊皮纸纹理，营造设计草图本氛围。  
光影：干净柔和的阴影，统一整体画面。  
输出：4K高清2D插画，在性感与时尚杂志风格之间取得平衡。

采用动态的动作姿势或充满力量的站姿，搭配夸张的透视和戏剧性的角度。  
背景应为图形化且具电影感：抽象的城市形态、速度线或能量爆炸效果，但不得喧宾夺主。  
光照需具戏剧性，运用强烈的明暗对比营造深度与视觉冲击。  
最终风格：高质量现代漫画封面，细节锐利、色彩鲜艳、构图充满动感，呈现专业插画水准与强烈视觉冲击力。  
切勿改变面部，仅进行风格化处理。

title: 九面风尚：潮流人格拼贴
prompts: 基于[上传人物图片]并严苛保持面部特征不变，生成一张极具时尚感和网络热门度的3x3九宫格拼贴照片，九个独立画面分别展示该人物身着：酷飒街头风黑色Oversized卫衣配工装裤（涂鸦霓虹后巷背景）、清纯性感风白色丝绸吊带睡裙外搭针织衫（柔光慵懒卧室窗边背景）、紧身塑形时尚瑜伽套装（高端采光健身房背景）、复古Y2K辣妹短T恤配低腰牛仔裙（千禧风彩色充满CD的房间背景）、华丽黑色高开叉亮片晚礼服（城市天际线天台酒吧夜景背景）、前卫赛博朋克机能风束带装束（未来感雨夜街道蓝紫光背景）、都市摩登风廓形西装内搭露脐装（极简高级艺术馆背景）、热辣度假风比基尼配透明防晒罩衫（奢华海景泳池日落背景）以及静奢老钱风粗花呢小香风外套套装（古典欧式庄园庭院背景），整体画面追求高级杂志大片质感、光影迷人且富有潮流张力。

title: 复古照相亭里的甜蜜瞬间
prompts:
Create a realistic vintage-style photo booth / Polaroid photo collage featuring the same couple, using the two uploaded images as exact face references for both individuals (preserve both identities accurately).
The couple appears natural, affectionate, and playful, captured in multiple candid moments as if taken inside a photo booth. The woman and the man maintain their original facial features, skin tones, and expressions.
Woman: elegant, feminine, glowing skin, natural makeup, soft blush, glossy lips, long dark hair styled loosely with gentle volume. Wearing a minimal strapless cream or light beige dress.
Man: clean and handsome appearance, short dark hair, light stubble or clean-shaven, wearing a black leather jacket over a white shirt
Scenes & poses included in the collage:
The woman smiling brightly while the man stands behind her playfully covering her eyes.
The couple standing close, facing each other lovingly, her hand resting on his chest.
A close face-to-face moment with soft smiles and eye contact.
The woman standing behind the man, making a peace sign while smiling at the camera.
A playful dancing pose where the man lifts one of the woman’s hands as if spinning her.
A relaxed, candid moment where both laugh naturally at the camera.
Environment: neutral photo booth backdrop with soft vertical curtains, warm indoor lighting, subtle shadows, cozy and intimate atmosphere.
Photography style: vintage Polaroid / analog photo booth aesthetic, slightly soft focus, gentle grain, mild blur, natural imperfections, warm tones, realistic skin texture.
Lighting: soft frontal flash combined with ambient light, creating a casual, real-life snapshot feeling.
Mood & vibe: romantic, playful, spontaneous, intimate, youthful, nostalgic.
Composition: multi-frame vertical collage, evenly spaced images, authentic photo booth layout.
Quality: high realism, not AI-looking, natural proportions, no distortion.

创作一张逼真的复古风格照相亭/Polaroid 照片拼贴，使用上传的两张图像作为两人面部的精确参考（准确保留两人的身份特征）。  
这对情侣表现自然、亲昵且充满玩味，仿佛在照相亭内抓拍到的多个随性瞬间。男女双方均保持原有的面部特征、肤色和表情。

女性：优雅、柔美，肌肤透亮，妆容自然，淡淡腮红，唇部有光泽，深色长发松散地挽起，带有柔和蓬松感。身穿简约无肩带的米白色或浅米色连衣裙。  
男性：干净英俊，黑色短发，略带胡茬或干净剃须，身穿黑色皮夹克，内搭白色衬衫。

拼贴中包含以下场景与姿势：  
- 女性灿烂微笑，男性站在她身后，调皮地蒙住她的眼睛。  
- 两人紧靠站立，深情对视，她的手轻放在他的胸口。  
- 两人近距离面对面，带着柔和微笑并有眼神交流。  
- 女性站在男性身后，对着镜头比出和平手势并微笑。  
- 两人摆出活泼的舞姿，男性抬起女性一只手，仿佛正要旋转她。  
- 两人放松自然地对着镜头开怀大笑。

环境：中性色调的照相亭背景，配有柔和垂落的竖向帘布，温暖的室内灯光，轻微阴影，营造温馨亲密的氛围。  

摄影风格：复古Polaroid / 胶片照相亭美学，略微柔焦，细腻颗粒感，轻微模糊，带有自然瑕疵，暖色调，真实肌肤质感。  

光线：柔和正面闪光结合环境光，营造出日常快照的真实感。  

情绪与氛围：浪漫、俏皮、随性、亲密、青春、怀旧。  

构图：多帧纵向拼贴，图像间距均匀，忠实还原照相亭布局。  

画质：高度写实，不显AI痕迹，比例自然，无畸变。
description: 一对情侣在复古Polaroid照相亭中捕捉自然亲昵的多帧瞬间，暖调胶片质感尽显浪漫怀旧氛围。

title: 维多利亚哥特皇室封面写真
prompts:
生成一张 9:16 竖版「维多利亚哥特皇室」写实照片：以我上传的 FACE_REF 为人物身份参考，100%还原五官与骨相；人物身穿“维多利亚时代（19世纪）宫廷礼服方向”的重工礼服（紧身胸衣、大裙撑、蕾丝/天鹅绒、皇室珠宝），在伦敦塔桥或威斯敏斯特宫（大本钟）旁拍摄。画面具备《Harper’s Bazaar》级别的摄影、造型与封面设计，保持杂志的一贯设计风格（中英文设计）。

【INPUTS | 输入】
FACE_REF：我上传的人物五官参考图（身份锁定）

【ABSOLUTE PRIORITY | 身份锁定（最高优先级）】
100%还原 FACE_REF 的五官与骨相：眼距、鼻梁鼻翼、唇形、下颌线、颧骨结构完全一致，不得漂移。
真实皮肤质感：可见细微纹理与毛孔，不要过度磨皮与网红化。
成年女性形象（adult）。

【SHOT TYPE | 景别二选一（由模型随机选其一，且必须真实统一）】
A) 半身封面：胸口到腰上方，珠宝、蕾丝领口与眼神最清晰（主推）
B) 全身封面：从头到脚完整呈现巨大的裙撑轮廓与伦敦地标的结合，透视感强（备选）
（无论A/B：都必须保持“封面构图”，有留白空间给排版，但不要撕纸/手绘效果。）

【LOCATION | 场景（英国伦敦）】
伦敦地标：泰晤士河畔，背景是宏伟的哥特式建筑威斯敏斯特宫（大本钟）或 伦敦塔桥的塔楼。
天气二选一（随机）：1) 伦敦雾霭（经典的雾都质感，光线柔和神秘） 2) 阴雨方歇（地面湿润反光，天空呈铅灰色）
背景干净：无游客、无现代标识、无手机状态栏UI、无水印字幕。

【LIGHTING & CAMERA | 摄影质感（杂志级）】
镜头感：85mm人像质感（半身）或 50mm/70mm（全身），浅景深，眼睛最清晰。
光线：阴天漫射光 + 戏剧性补光（强调面部结构）；钻石/宝石有真实火彩；天鹅绒质感深邃。
色彩：高级电影感，低饱和度的蓝灰环境色与服装的深色调（红/蓝/黑）形成哥特美学；整体干净、通透、贵气。

【WARDROBE | 维多利亚宫廷礼服（重工、塑形、繁复细节）】
目标审美：“蜂腰、大裙摆、层叠蕾丝、重磅天鹅绒、皇冠、女王气场”。

轮廓与层次（X型剪裁）
上身：结构感极强的紧身胸衣（Corset），方领或高领，泡泡袖或羊腿袖
下身：巨大的裙撑（Crinoline 或 Bustle），后腰部有明显的堆叠设计，裙摆拖地
装饰：大量的荷叶边、蝴蝶结、垂坠的流苏
面料与工艺（重手艺必须“看得见”）
主面料：重磅丝绒、塔夫绸、尚蒂伊蕾丝（Chantilly Lace）
主要工艺：珠绣、金线刺绣、缎带编织
纹样主题：大马士革纹（Damask）、玫瑰、蓟花（苏格兰象征）、佩斯利纹
细节：蕾丝手套、颈饰（Choker）、勋章/胸针
头面（皇室珠宝头饰）
核心结构：维多利亚式小王冠（Tiara）或 羽毛头饰
装饰：钻石、蓝宝石、珍珠
耳饰/颈饰：极度夸张的钻石项链、耳坠

【COLOR MATRIX | 颜色矩阵搭配（必须执行，且必须“皇室深色”）】
（维多利亚晚期的深沉奢华）
从以下三套“主色方案”中随机选 1 套作为【底色/大面积主面料色】。

Scheme G（皇室蓝底）：
底色：深宝蓝/午夜蓝（丝绒质感）
刺绣/装饰：银色蕾丝、钻石、蓝宝石
Scheme A（维多利亚红底）：
底色：酒红/勃艮第红（深沉热情）
刺绣/装饰：黑色蕾丝、金色刺绣、红宝石
Scheme R（丧服黑底）：
底色：墨黑（Black Jet，极度哥特）
刺绣/装饰：黑色串珠、黑色蕾丝、少量金色或银色提亮

【颜色执行规则】
色彩要深沉浓郁，体现“日不落”的威严和哥特式的神秘。

【POSE | 封面姿态（威严、僵直、女王感）】
半身：下巴微扬，眼神冷峻，一手轻抚项链
全身：站姿挺拔（像肖像画一样），双手交叠在裙撑上，气场压倒一切
表情：严肃、高傲、不可一世；绝对不笑（维多利亚风格）。

【OUTPUT | 输出】
1 张 9:16 竖版写实杂志封面级照片
随机：半身 or 全身（A/B二选一）
随机：雾霭 or 阴雨（天气二选一）
随机：宝蓝 / 酒红 / 墨黑（颜色矩阵三选一）
造型：维多利亚宫廷礼服方向 + 皇冠/Choker + 紧身胸衣大裙撑 + 丝绒蕾丝
description: 身着重工宫廷礼服的女性立于伦敦雾霭中，深色丝绒与皇室珠宝映衬哥特式威严，宛如《Harper’s Bazaar》经典封面。

title: 奢华生活四宫格
description: 一位时尚女性在四种场景中展现华丽生活方式，从夜色蛋糕到城市街头，尽显网红魅力。

title: 节气养生手作茶艺图鉴
prompts:
A straight-on photograph showing TWO elements vertically arranged and centered against a pure white wall background:

[UPPER ELEMENT - SHADOW BOX FRAME]

A handcrafted light oak wooden shadow box frame mounted on the wall. Inside, against textured off-white rice paper backing with hand-torn deckled edges, delicate {季节性植物装饰} are scattered as {季节} seasonal decoration.

TOP CENTER: Large black traditional Chinese calligraphy "{节气名称}" in bold forceful brush strokes, flanked by small cinnabar red traditional seals. Below in smaller elegant script: "{该节气养生古籍名言}"

CENTER-LEFT ARRANGEMENT: Two adorable handmade clay figurines (2 inches tall):
- First child: {颜色1} {服装描述}, {手持物品}, {表情描述}, rosy cheeks
- Second child: {颜色2} {服装描述}, {动作描述}, {表情描述}, {配饰描述}
- Both hand-painted colored clay showing folk art craftsmanship in {季节色调} tones, positioned {互动场景描述}

CENTER-RIGHT ARRANGEMENT: Artful curation of dried ingredients:
- Two small corked glass vials at different heights: one with {食材A}, one with {食材B}
- Pinned with antique brass pins: {食材C} lifted creating shadows, {食材D}, {食材E}, {食材F}
- Miniature {颜色} glazed teapot (1 inch scale)
- Hand-written aged paper labels: "{食材A标签}" "{食材B标签}" "{食材C标签}" "{食材D标签}" "{食材E标签}" "{食材F标签}"

LEFT SIDE: Vertical label "{茶饮名称}"

[LOWER ELEMENT - LARGE ILLUSTRATED INSTRUCTION CARD]

A LARGE rectangular premium textured rice paper (12 x 16 inches) mounted below with hand-torn edges and visible paper fibers. Burlap sample pouch with wooden bead tied with hemp string pinned to top right corner.

TOP SECTION:
- Center: "制作说明" in large elegant black traditional font (bold, prominent)
- Thin double-line decorative border beneath
- Small {季节植物} illustrations flanking title

MAIN CONTENT - 4 ILLUSTRATED STEPS in horizontal layout:

**步骤 1: 准备食材**
- Left: Large "①" in circular cinnabar red ink brush seal
- Center: Charming simple line drawing showing six cute little bowls in a row, each containing different ingredients, with tiny labels above, drawn in minimalist black ink with playful style
- Right: "准备: {食材A}Xg、{食材B}Xg、{食材C}Xg、{食材D}Xg、{食材E}Xg、{食材F}Xg。"

**步骤 2: 预处理**
- Left: Large "②" in circular cinnabar red ink brush seal
- Center: Simple line drawing of hands {预处理动作描述}, mortar and pestle, cutting board, small knife visible, instructional cartoon style
- Right: "预处理: {具体预处理步骤描述}。"

**步骤 3: 煮制过程**
- Left: Large "③" in circular cinnabar red ink brush seal
- Center: Simple line drawing of traditional clay pot on flame, steam rising with curly lines, clock showing {X}minutes, ingredients visible inside pot, warm inviting style
- Right: "煮制: 将所有食材放入砂锅,加水{X}ml,大火煮开后转小火煎煮{X}分钟,滤出汤汁。"

**步骤 4: 饮用建议**
- Left: Large "④" in circular cinnabar red ink brush seal
- Center: Simple line drawing of steaming decorative tea cup, tiny happy character holding cup, sun/moon symbols (timing), heart with warmth radiating lines, cozy welcoming style
- Right: "饮用: {饮用时间和方式}。{功效描述},{节气养生理念}。"

DECORATIVE ELEMENTS:
- Thin vertical divider lines (hand-drawn ink) separating illustrations from text
- Traditional Chinese cloud pattern corner flourishes in each corner
- Subtle aged tea-stain watercolor wash around edges (very light)
- Tiny hand-drawn {季节符号} scattered in white space (snowflakes for winter, leaves for autumn, etc.)
- Small wellness icon symbols: teacup, heart, clock icons in muted {色调} tones

BOTTOM SECTION:
- Right: Red square seal stamp "神娃手作" (1.5 inches) with uneven hand-stamping texture
- Left: Elegant {季节植物} illustration (3 inches) in delicate black ink with subtle color wash
- Center: Thin decorative border with small repeating pattern

COMPOSITION: 85mm lens, f/5.6, perfectly centered vertical alignment, 3:4 portrait, ultra-clean white wall, museum-quality gallery presentation. Large card becomes equal visual weight to shadow box, creating balanced artistic diptych.

title: nano banana pro cost saving trick for product photography. instead of burning credits for experimenting one image at a time. show it an example, ask for a 6x6 grid, pick your favorite
prompts:
nano banana pro cost saving trick for product photography. instead of burning credits for experimenting one image at a time. show it an example, ask for a 6x6 grid, pick your favorite

prompt (for different and similar mood and quality): Generate a 6x6 grid of professional product photography. Reference the original image's mood, quality, and aesthetic. Each cell should showcase a completely different product (bags, bottles, hats, cosmetics, jewelry, food, electronics, etc.) in a unique studio setting with a distinct color palette. Maintain the same high-end commercial photography style throughout. Vary the products, lighting, backgrounds, props, and styling dramatically across all 36 images.

prompt (for balanced diversity):
Generate a 6x6 grid of variations based on the original image. Keep the same product but vary the color palettes, backgrounds, lighting, angles, props, and styling dramatically across all 36 cells. Maintain the same professional quality and aesthetic throughout.

prompt (for maximum diversity):
Generate a 6x6 grid showing 36 unique variations of this product. Experiment wildly with color palettes, environments (studio, lifestyle, minimal, textured backgrounds), lighting styles, compositions, and moods. Keep product recognition and professional quality consistent, but make each cell visually distinct.

（用于不同但风格与质感相近的效果）：生成一个6x6网格的专业产品摄影作品。参考原图的情绪、画质和美学风格。每个格子展示完全不同的产品（如包袋、瓶子、帽子、化妆品、珠宝、食品、电子产品等），置于独特的影棚环境中，并采用鲜明的配色方案。整体保持高端商业摄影风格，36张图像在产品、灯光、背景、道具和造型上均显著不同。

提示词（用于平衡多样性）：基于原图生成一个6x6网格的变体。保持相同的产品，但在36个格子中大幅改变配色方案、背景、灯光、角度、道具和造型。整体维持一致的专业品质与美学风格。

提示词（用于最大多样性）：生成一个6x6网格，展示该产品的36种独特变体。大胆尝试各种配色方案、环境（影棚、生活场景、极简、肌理背景）、灯光风格、构图和情绪氛围。在确保产品辨识度和专业品质的前提下，使每个格子在视觉上截然不同。

title: 订书机×拉面潮鞋
prompts:
This Nano Banana Pro prompt turns everyday objects into sneakers or jackets, depending on what you want.  I used a stapler, marble run, bitcoin, and ramen with eggs meal

Act as the "Streetwear Algorithm" AI. 
 Turns any organic texture or random object into a limited-edition "Hypebeast" sneaker or puffer jacket drop.
 
Input A : [look at attached image]
Input B: Chunky Sneaker  (or Puffer Jacket - choose one based on what fits the shape best) 

 Smart Logic - Execute Step-by-Step : 
 Analyze Input A: Extract the  Color Palette  (primary, secondary),  Material Physics   (soft vs. hard), and  Key Features  (logos, hinges, buttons).
 2.   Apply Design Language: 
 IF Input A = Organic (food/nature), apply "Bio-Mimicry" (wavy curves, soft volume). 
 IF Input A = Industrial/Grunge (rust/wires), apply "Deconstructivist" (exposed stitching, raw edges). 
 IF Input A = Rigid/Household (stapler, appliance, car), apply "Hard-Surface Integration." 

(must follow: The shoe must look like it is MANUFACTURED from the object parts. Example: Use the red plastic casing for the shoe upper, metal hinges for the sole, logos as branding tags). 
3. Render:  Generate a studio product shot on a floating pedestal. 8k resolution, cinematic lighting.
 
Output:  A viral hype-fashion item that looks 100% real.

扮演“街头潮服算法”AI，  
将任何有机纹理或随机物体转化为限量版“潮流达人”运动鞋或羽绒夹克新品。

输入 A：[查看附图]  
输入 B：厚底运动鞋（或羽绒夹克——根据物体形状选择最合适的）

智能逻辑 - 分步执行：  
1. 分析输入 A：提取色彩搭配（主色、辅色）、材质物理特性（软/硬）和关键特征（标志、铰链、按钮）。  
2. 应用设计语言：  
   - 若输入 A 为有机物（食物/自然），采用“仿生设计”（波浪曲线、柔软体积感）。  
   - 若输入 A 为工业/粗犷风格（锈迹/电线），采用“解构主义”（外露缝线、毛边处理）。  
   - 若输入 A 为硬质/日用品（订书机、电器、汽车），采用“硬表面融合”。  

（必须遵守：成品鞋必须看起来是由该物体部件制造而成。例如：用红色塑料外壳作为鞋面，金属铰链作为鞋底，原有标志作为品牌标签。）  
3. 渲染：生成置于悬浮展台上的产品摄影图像，8K 分辨率，电影级灯光。

输出：一款看起来 100% 真实、具备病毒式传播潜力的潮流时尚单品。

title: 文学幻境：微缩名著奇景
prompts:
I love how Nano Banana Pro handles these prompts. Here are two of them. For the 2nd one, I used Nano Banana just to test. 

1. Surreal diorama emerging from an open vintage book of "Brave New World" by Aldous Huxley: the pages form a futuristic hatching laboratory with rows of glowing test tubes containing embryonic figures on conveyor belts, lab-coated workers in white uniforms operating machines, a large all-seeing eye symbol on the wall, conveyor belts moving via hidden mechanisms, cool blue neon lighting, hyper-detailed miniature sculpture, clinical and eerie atmosphere, photorealistic.

2. Detailed miniature diorama in an open aged book for "Don Quixote" by Cervantes: left page with "DON QUIXOTE" engraved, right pages sculpted into a Spanish landscape with a massive wooden windmill turning slowly, tiny knight on horseback charging with lance raised, Sancho Panza on donkey following, dusty plains and gears for windmill blades, warm golden hour lighting, hyper-realistic handcrafted sculpture, whimsical yet epic scale.

1. 超现实微缩场景从一本打开的阿道司·赫胥黎《美丽新世界》古籍中浮现：书页构成一座未来主义孵化实验室，一排排发光的试管内含胚胎人形，置于传送带上，身穿白色制服的实验员操作机器，墙上绘有巨大的全视之眼符号，传送带由隐藏机械驱动，冷色调蓝色霓虹灯光，高度精细的微型雕塑，氛围冷静而诡异，照片级写实。

2. 一本打开的塞万提斯《堂吉诃德》古籍内呈现精细微缩场景：左页刻有“DON QUIXOTE”字样，右页雕刻成西班牙风景，一座巨大的木制风车缓缓转动，微小的骑士骑马高举长矛冲锋，桑丘·潘沙骑驴紧随其后，尘土飞扬的平原上设有驱动风车叶片的齿轮装置，温暖的黄金时刻光线，超写实手工雕塑，兼具奇趣与史诗感。
description: 从经典古籍中跃出的超写实微缩世界，融合未来实验室与骑士冒险，冷静诡异与史诗奇趣并存。

title: 分屏堆叠：1×4构图法
prompts:
SPLIT STACK (1X4 grid)

Now that everyone has gotten the 3x3 grids out of their system for generating different angles, it feels like the right moment to double down on something I shared on day one of Nano Banana’s public release.

You will get more consistent results using a vertical image split into four frames (what I call a split stack), then splitting and extracting from there.

Lost detail is lost.

A 3x3 grid can give you something decent, but consistency quickly breaks down. Angles drift. Details soften. The model starts inventing what it thinks you want because its attention is split across 9, 12, or 16 frames at once.

Personally, I use 1x4 vertical grids and export each frame to 16:9 afterward.

Two reasons:
1/ It preserves detail and consistency shot after shot.
Instead of playing roulette by asking for random angles, it forces you to be intentional. 
2/You describe the shot you need, the background you expect, and the framing that serves your story. Nano Banana Pro still struggles with environment rotation unless you guide it very explicitly.

You do you. But I have watched the 3x3 approach go viral a week after this method was shared, get adopted by everyone, and now I am seeing many of those same people quietly move away from it because it does not deliver on consistency.

Trends move fast. Fundamentals still matter.

分屏堆叠（1×4 网格）

既然大家都已经用 3×3 网格生成不同角度过瘾了，现在似乎是时候回归我在 Nano Banana 公开发布第一天就分享的方法了。

使用一张垂直图像分成四个画面（我称之为“分屏堆叠”），然后再分别裁剪提取，你会获得更一致的结果。

细节一旦丢失，就再也找不回来了。

3×3 网格或许能给出尚可的效果，但一致性很快就会崩塌：角度偏移、细节模糊，模型因为注意力同时分散在 9、12 甚至 16 个画面中，开始自行揣测你想要的内容。

我个人使用 1×4 的垂直网格，之后再将每一帧导出为 16:9 比例。

原因有二：  
1/ 它能逐帧保留细节与一致性。  
与其靠随机角度碰运气，不如主动明确你的需求。  
2/ 你可以精准描述所需镜头、预期背景以及服务于叙事的构图。除非你非常明确地引导，否则 Nano Banana Pro 在环境旋转方面仍存在困难。

你可以按自己的方式来。但我注意到，在这种方法公布一周后，3×3 方法迅速走红并被众人效仿；如今，其中不少人已悄然放弃它，因为它无法保证一致性。

潮流转瞬即逝，基本功依然重要。
description: 用1×4垂直分屏保留细节与画面一致性，精准控制镜头与叙事构图。

title: 3×3图像分割工具
prompts:
Previously, I used to send a 3×3 grid to Nano Banana Pro and ask it to extract an image by “row and column” — and it failed way too often.

So I ended up building a small tool myself:

Just upload an image ✅
Automatically generate a 3×3 grid ✅
Split it instantly and export any single cell in high resolution ✅

所以我最后自己构建了一个小工具：

只需上传一个图像 ✅
自动生成一个3×3的网格 ✅
立即分割并导出任何单个单元格为高分辨率图像 ✅
description: 一键上传，自动生成并导出高清3×3网格中的任意单元格。

title: 倒悬金字塔：吉萨的黄金幻象
prompts: on  Photorealistic ultra-wide desert scene in Egypt near the Giza plateau at golden hour. A colossal inverted pyramid, point-down, dominates the landscape at an unimaginable scale, dwarfing the horizon. Its vast upper rim stretches for multiple kilometers, while the sloping faces plunge inward toward a needle-like apex that hovers just above the sand, leaving a gigantic shadowed void beneath. The surface reads as ancient limestone blocks with dark granite inlays: mega-sized courses, eroded edges, wind-sanded wear, and long, faint bands of hieroglyphs that only appear where the sun grazes the stone. Include tiny scale cues in the distance: a thin line of tourists like ants, a few small buses and 4x4s parked far away, a camel caravan crossing the flats, and scattered survey flags. Heat haze and dust plumes soften the far edges. Sand dunes climb the lower planes where stone meets desert, with drifting sand spilling down seams like a slow waterfall. Pale sky, low sun, strong raking light, extreme HDR realism, crisp micro-textures, natural color grading, no glow or energy effects.

埃及吉萨高原附近黄金时刻的超写实超宽幅沙漠场景。一座巨大无比的倒置金字塔（尖端朝下）以难以想象的规模主宰着地平线，其庞大的上缘绵延数公里，倾斜的面朝内汇聚至一个针尖般的顶点，悬停于沙面之上，在下方投下巨大的阴影空洞。表面呈现为古老的石灰岩巨块，嵌有深色花岗岩饰条：巨型层叠石阶、风蚀边缘、风沙磨痕，以及仅在阳光掠过石面时才隐约可见的细长象形文字带。远处加入微小的比例参照物：如蚂蚁般的一列游客、几辆停在远方的小型巴士和越野车、一支穿越平地的骆驼商队，以及零星分布的勘测旗。热浪与尘雾柔化了远景边缘。沙丘沿着石体底部与沙漠交界处向上攀爬，流沙顺着接缝如缓慢瀑布般倾泻而下。天空苍白，低角度阳光，强烈的侧光照明，极致HDR写实风格，清晰的微观纹理，自然色彩分级，无发光或能量特效。
description: 超写实沙漠中，一座倒置巨金字塔主宰地平线，古老石面与流沙交织，微小人影衬出其恢弘尺度。

title: 复古机械×智能厨房新发明
prompts:
Nano Banana Pro can replace industrial designers, invent new products with patents. This is for a kitchen appliance. You can modify it for other things. 

 Act as a world class industrial designer with flawless foresight. 

PROMPT 1 (Constraints): “Invent a groundbreaking kitchen appliance fusing only vintage mechanical principles (pre-1950), one modern microcontroller (e.g., Arduino-compatible), and sustainable biomaterials—no plastics.” 

PROMPT 2: Generate 4 variants solving unsolved everyday frustrations (e.g., zero-waste cooking) 

Output: 4x2 vertical grid: Top row—clean orthographic patent drawings (front, side, section, isometric) in USPTO style; Bottom row—glossy studio photography of the physical prototype on matte black background with dramatic lighting. Include name, core mechanism, and estimated retail price underneath each.

扮演一位具备完美前瞻性的世界级工业设计师。

提示词1（约束条件）：“发明一款突破性的厨房电器，仅融合1950年以前的复古机械原理、一个现代微控制器（例如兼容Arduino）和可持续生物材料——不得使用塑料。”

提示词2：生成4种变体，解决尚未被满足的日常痛点（例如零浪费烹饪）。

输出格式：4×2垂直网格布局。上排——采用美国专利商标局（USPTO）风格的清晰正交专利图纸（前视图、侧视图、剖面图、等距视图）；下排——在哑光黑色背景上以戏剧性灯光拍摄的实物原型高清摄影图。每件作品下方注明名称、核心机制及预估零售价。
description: 融合1950年前机械原理与Arduino的可持续厨房电器，零浪费设计，专利级创新。

title: 盛唐贵妃邂逅巴黎铁塔
prompts:
生成一张 9:16 竖版「大唐盛世与巴黎」写实照片：以我上传的 FACE_REF 为人物身份参考，100%还原五官与骨相；人物身穿“唐代（盛唐）宫廷贵妃方向”的重工礼服（齐胸衫裙、大袖衫、牡丹纹样、金饰），在巴黎埃菲尔铁塔下的特罗卡德罗广场或塞纳河畔拍摄。画面具备COSMO时尚杂志级别的摄影、造型与封面设计，保持杂志的一贯设计风格（英文设计）。

【INPUTS | 输入】 FACE_REF：我上传的人物五官参考图（身份锁定）

【ABSOLUTE PRIORITY | 身份锁定（最高优先级）】 100%还原 FACE_REF 的五官与骨相：脸型、容貌、眼距、鼻梁鼻翼、唇形、下颌线、颧骨结构完全一致，不得漂移。 真实皮肤质感：可见细微纹理与毛孔，不要过度磨皮与网红化。 成年女性形象。

【SHOT TYPE | 景别二选一（由模型随机选其一，且必须真实统一）】 A) 半身封面：胸口到腰上方，头面与上身刺绣最清晰，眼睛对焦最锐利（主推） B) 全身封面：从头到脚完整呈现层叠礼服与裙摆纹样，铁塔的钢结构透视更强（备选） （无论A/B：都必须保持“封面构图”，有留白空间给排版，但不要撕纸/手绘效果。）

【LOCATION | 场景（巴黎埃菲尔铁塔）】 巴黎埃菲尔铁塔：经典的钢结构塔身背景。天气二选一（随机）：1) 巴黎阴雨（地面微湿，光线柔和高级灰色调，时尚感强） 2) 绚丽黄昏（夕阳余晖，金色光影，浪漫氛围） 背景干净：无游客、无现代标识、无手机状态栏UI、无水印字幕、无护栏。

【LIGHTING & CAMERA | 摄影质感（杂志级）】 镜头感：85mm人像质感（半身）或 50mm/70mm（全身），浅景深，眼睛最清晰。 光线：自然光（强调环境光） + 电影级补光；金饰有真实高光但不爆；丝绸光泽清晰可辨。 色彩：高级电影感，法式米灰/蓝灰色调与唐代服装的“红绿金”配色形成强烈视觉张力；整体干净、通透、质感厚。

【WARDROBE | 唐代宫廷礼服（丰腴、飘逸、色彩浓烈）】 目标审美：“金饰华丽、面靥花钿、齐胸裙、披帛飘逸、大红大绿大金、极度张扬”。

轮廓与层次（必须体现唐代特征） 内层：诃子（抹胸），露出颈部与上胸肌肤（唐代开放风气） 中层：对襟短衫（直领），材质透明轻薄（罗/纱） 外层：大袖衫（极宽大的袖子，拖地），像翅膀一样张开 装饰：披帛（长长的丝带），挽在手臂间，随风飘舞 下装：齐胸破裙（裙腰系在胸口，裙摆宽大，多色拼接或印花） 面料与工艺（重手艺必须“看得见”） 主面料：丝绸、织锦、印金纱（轻盈与厚重结合） 主要工艺：印染（蜡染/夹路）、金线刺绣、织金 纹样主题（适配大唐）：宝相花、缠枝牡丹、瑞兽（狮子/麒麟）、团花（图案巨大、饱满） 细节：花钿（额头红色装饰）、面靥（嘴角红点）、臂钗（大臂上的金属饰品） 头面（唐代雍容华贵头饰） 核心结构：高耸的发髻（云髻/坠马髻），插戴大朵牡丹花（真花或绢花） 装饰：金梳背（插在发髻上的金梳子）、步摇（走动摇曳）、金钗 耳饰：贵重金玉

【COLOR MATRIX | 颜色矩阵搭配（必须执行，且必须“浓烈唐风”）】 （调整为唐代流行色：红绿撞色、金碧辉煌） 从以下三套“主色方案”中随机选 1 套作为【底色/大面积主面料色】。

Scheme G（石青/翠绿底）： 底色：翠绿/石青（常用的间色） 刺绣/印染：茜红、金色、橘黄、米白 Scheme A（牡丹红底）： 底色：牡丹红/石榴红（最经典的唐风） 刺绣/印染：金色、翠绿、宝蓝、紫 Scheme R（紫底）： 底色：紫/葡萄色（高贵） 刺绣/印染：金色、朱红、草绿、银

【颜色执行规则】 色彩对比要强烈，体现盛唐气象，但整体色调要统一在高级感中。

【POSE | 封面姿态（自信、舒展、女王感）】 半身：微昂头，眼神睥睨，一手轻抚发髻或披帛 全身：双臂张开带动大袖衫和披帛，展现服装的体积感，气场全开 表情：自信、张扬、妩媚、大方；不要羞涩。

【OUTPUT | 输出】 1 张 9:16 竖版写实杂志封面级照片 随机：半身 or 全身（A/B二选一） 随机：阴雨 or 黄昏（天气二选一） 随机：翠绿 / 牡丹红 / 紫（颜色矩阵三选一） 造型：唐代宫廷礼服方向 + 牡丹花/金梳头面 + 齐胸大袖 + 披帛
description: 身着华丽唐装的贵妃立于埃菲尔铁塔下，红绿金绣与法式灰调交织，演绎跨时空时尚封面。

title: 电影角色玩具收藏盒
prompts:
Toyification
Input A is the subject photo (movie poster or movie name).
Analyze uploaded movie characters, story line, scenes, and pick the most important or iconic scene. 

Optional Input B is a style reference (toy photography / product shot you like). If B is missing, choose a premium toy-ad aesthetic.

Goal: Turn Input A into a hyper-real miniature DIORAMA inside a clear acrylic “collector toy box” with beautiful packaging design (no text/logos).  

Rules:
- The subjects becomes a tiny, ultra-detailed figurine or miniature version of themselves inside a miniature scene appropriate for the uploaded image. 
- Surround it with 6–10 mini props that match the uploaded image's story 
- Packaging should look premium: clear acrylic front, matte paper backer, subtle emboss feel, color palette inferred from Input A.
- Lighting: clean studio softbox, crisp reflections, subtle shadow under box.
- Composition: product hero shot, centered, 3/4 view, shallow depth of field.

Output:
- ONE image, 4:5 or 1:1 (choose the most “product post” viral crop).
- movie name 3D printed at the base. 
- Keep it cute and premium, not uncanny.

玩具化
输入A是主题照片（电影海报或电影名称）。
分析上传的电影角色、故事情节、场景，并挑选最重要的或标志性的场景。

可选输入B是风格参考（你喜欢的玩具摄影/产品拍摄）。如果缺少B，选择优质的玩具广告美学。

目标：将输入A转化为一个超现实的小型立体模型，放置在透明亚克力“收藏玩具盒”内，并具有美丽的包装设计（无文字/标志）。

规则：
- 主体变为微小、超细节的人偶或上传图像所适合的微型场景中的缩小版本。
- 周围环绕6到10个与上传图像故事相匹配的小道具。
- 包装应看起来高档：透明亚克力前面板，哑光纸背板，微妙的浮雕质感，色彩方案从输入A中推断。
- 照明：干净的工作室柔光箱，清晰的反射，盒子下方有细微阴影。
- 构图：以产品为主角拍摄，居中，3/4视角，浅景深。

输出：
- 一张图片，比例为4:5或1:1（选择最“产品发布”病毒式传播的裁剪方式）。
- 在底部3D打印电影名称。
- 保持可爱和高档，不要让人感觉不安。
description: 将经典电影场景微缩成精致人偶，置于高档亚克力收藏盒中，搭配故事相关小道具，呈现可爱又高级的玩具化艺术。

Subtle highlights, realistic shadows
High dynamic range, ultra-sharp focus
Editorial luxury advertising aesthetic
Premium sensory marketing look

Overall Feel:
Modern, refined, visually cohesive
High-end commercial campaign
Designed for brand websites, social grids, and digital billboards
Hyperreal, cinematic, polished, and aspirational

   > 提示：为获得最佳效果，请使用脸部约占画面 70% 的照片。  
4）前往 @NanoBanana_Labs 页面，挑选你喜欢的照片，并复制该照片描述中的文字提示。  
5）返回 Gemini 应用，将复制的文字粘贴到“描述你的图像”框中。  
点击右下角的火箭图标 🚀 生成你的图像。

关注 @NanoBanana_labs，每日获取 AI 美化技巧和热门提示 🚀。体验人工智能的力量，与 Nano Banana Pro 一起探索。

提示词 👇  
一张宁静的照片，展示上传参考图像中的人物（面部需 100% 准确）坐在静谧湖面上的一艘木制划艇中。湖水倒映着群山，人物手握船桨，露出温柔微笑。  
画面比例 4:5
description: 人物坐于木艇中，湖面如镜映群山，手握船桨微笑，氛围静谧悠然。

title: 宫墙·明制华裳写真
prompts:
生成一张 9:16 竖版「高端时尚杂志封面级」写实照片：以我上传的 FACE_REF 为人物身份参考，100%还原五官与骨相；人物身穿“明制华丽礼服方向”的重工汉服（多层叠穿、手工刺绣/织金锦、贵重金饰头面），在故宫红墙长廊雪景中拍摄。画面具备《Vogue》《Harper’s Bazaar》《ELLE》《Cosmopolitan》《Marie Claire》《i-D》《Allure》《FLAUNT》级别的摄影、造型与封面设计，以上杂志随机任选一作为杂志的封面设计，并保持选择杂志的一贯设计风格（中英文设计）
【INPUTS | 输入】

FACE_REF：我上传的人物五官参考图（身份锁定）
【ABSOLUTE PRIORITY | 身份锁定（最高优先级）】

100%还原 FACE_REF 的五官与骨相：眼距、鼻梁鼻翼、唇形、下颌线、颧骨结构完全一致，不得漂移。
真实皮肤质感：可见细微纹理与毛孔，不要过度磨皮与网红化。
成年女性形象（adult）。
【SHOT TYPE | 景别二选一（由模型随机选其一，且必须真实统一）】
A) 半身封面：胸口到腰上方，头面与上身刺绣最清晰，眼睛对焦最锐利（主推）
B) 全身封面：从头到脚完整呈现层叠礼服与裙摆纹样，长廊纵深与红墙透视更强（备选）
（无论A/B：都必须保持“封面构图”，有留白空间给排版，但不要撕纸/手绘效果。）
【LOCATION | 场景（故宫/紫禁城）】

北京故宫红墙长廊：朱红墙、红柱、雕花窗棂、彩绘梁坊细节与强调透视纵深。
天气二选一（随机）：1) 细雪飘落 2) 雪后晴朗（檐下/台阶残雪、空气通透）
背景干净：无游客、无现代标识、无手机状态栏UI、无水印字幕。
【LIGHTING & CAMERA | 摄影质感（杂志级）】

镜头感：85mm人像质感（半身）或 50mm/70mm（全身），浅景深，眼睛最清晰。
光线：冬日自然光 + 柔和补光；金饰/珠翠有真实高光但不爆；刺绣纹理清晰可辨。
色彩：高级电影感，红墙与服装主色不互相脏染；整体干净、通透、质感厚。
【WARDROBE | 明制华丽礼服（重工、多层叠、可读的硬锚点）】
目标审美：“金饰为主、流苏密集、凤冠、衣服大面积织金刺绣、层叠繁复但高级不俗艳”。

轮廓与层次（必须多层叠穿）
内层：白色里衣立领/里领清晰可见（干净、挺括，做出层次边界）
中层：对襟袄/衫（或方领/立领结构感），袖口宽大、滚边精细
外层：披帛/霞帔式的礼服结构（有明显“压襟/佩饰”承托），整体层次厚重
下装：长裙/马面裙方向，裙摆纹样连续，底边有织金边或刺绣边（全身版本必须明显）
面料与工艺（重手艺必须“看得见”）
主面料：织金锦/提花锦（真实纤维感，暗纹浮起）
主要工艺：盘金绣、金线绣、立体刺绣、贴布绣（让花纹有“微微起伏”的厚度）
纹样主题：牡丹/团花/祥云/瑞兽（精致、密度高、但图案边缘清晰，瑞兽不能是龙）
细节：滚边、暗扣、系带、护领、胸前“压襟/璎珞感”层叠装饰（但不杂乱）
头面（黄金为主的重工头饰，必须华丽）
金色为主的方向：金丝累珠、点翠/珠翠、密集簪钗、左右对称的长流苏坠饰，凤冠
流苏长度与密度要“明显”：走动或微风时有轻微摆动
耳饰/颈饰：金+珍珠+玉（贵重但不廉价闪）
【COLOR MATRIX | 颜色矩阵搭配（必须执行，且必须“多彩刺绣”）】
从以下三套“主色方案”中随机选 1 套作为【底色/大面积主面料色】。
注意：主色只决定“底色”，刺绣必须是【宫廷织锦式多色刺绣】（不允许只有金色刺绣）。

Scheme G（翡翠绿底）：
底色：翡翠绿/孔雀绿（大面积主面料）
刺绣：多色绣线 + 盘金绣混用（至少包含：金色、朱红/胭脂红、宝蓝/靛蓝、米白、淡紫或藕粉）
层次点亮：米白里领/内衬边 + 少量朱红与宝蓝作为“宫廷撞色”点缀
Scheme A（杏底）：
底色：暖杏/米杏（大面积主面料）
刺绣：多色绣线 + 盘金绣混用（至少包含：金色、翡翠绿/松石绿、朱红/珊瑚红、孔雀蓝/靛蓝、米白）
层次点亮：用翡翠绿与朱红做小面积宫廷撞色，保持“雅而不素、贵而不艳”
Scheme R（红底）：
底色：深朱红/绛红（大面积主面料）
刺绣：多色绣线 + 盘金绣混用（至少包含：金色、孔雀蓝/靛蓝、松石绿、米白、胭脂粉或珊瑚红）
层次点亮：米白里领/内衬边 + 少量翡翠绿或孔雀蓝作冷暖对比
【颜色执行规则】

“多彩刺绣”必须看得见：至少 4 种以上彩色绣线清晰可辨，且与金线叠加，形成丰富层次。
纹样边缘要清晰，不糊成一片；红墙背景下服装与背景必须分离，层次清楚、低脏度、厚而不闷。
禁止出现“单一金色刺绣覆盖全身”的单调效果。
【POSE | 封面姿态（端庄、贵气、非摆拍俗气）】

半身：双手在身前轻持团扇/宫扇（扇面刺绣清晰），或一手轻拢袖口一手自然垂落
全身：站姿端正、重心稳定，裙摆自然垂坠；袖摆形成优雅弧线
表情：沉静、克制、自信；不要夸张大笑，不要做短视频“眨眼比心”。
【OUTPUT | 输出】

1 张 9:16 竖版写实杂志封面级照片
随机：半身 or 全身（A/B二选一）
随机：雪中 or 雪后晴朗（天气二选一）
随机：翡翠绿 / 杏/红 /（颜色矩阵三选一）
造型：明制华丽礼服方向 + 金色重工凤冠头面 + 多层叠穿 + 大面积织金刺绣
description: 身着明制重工汉服的女子立于故宫雪景红墙下，金饰流苏熠熠生辉，宛如高端时尚杂志封面。

title: 悬浮罐海报
description: 冰镇铝罐悬浮于奇幻环境中，冷凝水珠与蒸汽交织，超现实电影感十足。

title: 玻璃窗后的电影感凝视
prompts: A cinematic, close-up portrait of a young woman viewed through a reflective glass window. She has messy dark brown hair and hyper-realistic skin texture with visible pores and natural imperfections. One green-hazel eye is in sharp focus, while the rest of her face softens into the background. The lighting is moody and low-key, characterized by bright, glowing yellow and orange bokeh lights reflecting off the glass in the foreground. Shot with a shallow depth of field (f/1.2) to create a soft, emotional atmosphere with film grain and high-resolution details.
透过反光玻璃窗拍摄的一位年轻女性的电影感特写肖像。她拥有凌乱的深棕色头发，皮肤纹理超写实，可见毛孔与自然瑕疵。一只绿褐色的眼睛清晰锐利，而脸部其余部分则柔化融入背景。光线氛围阴郁低调，前景玻璃上反射出明亮、发光的黄色与橙色散景光斑。采用浅景深（f/1.2）拍摄，营造柔和而富有情感的氛围，带有胶片颗粒感和高分辨率细节。
description: 透过反光玻璃捕捉女性超写实特写，一只锐利眼眸穿透阴郁氛围，背景散景如光斑梦境。

title: 电影级3D动感广告大片
prompts: Cinematic 3D action-packed advertisement for [Product], captured in an intense mid-motion moment with dramatic studio lighting, dynamic particle effects, and high-impact slow-motion energy. Ultra-hyperrealistic rendering, razor-sharp details, glossy commercial finish, atmospheric depth, and powerful contrast. Viral-ready composition with the brand logo seamlessly integrated into the scene and a sleek, modern slogan positioned cleanly beneath. High-end blockbuster commercial aesthetic.
为[产品]打造一部电影级3D高能动感广告，捕捉激烈动作中的瞬间，搭配戏剧性的影棚灯光、动态粒子特效和极具冲击力的慢动作能量。超写实渲染，细节锐利无比，表面呈现光亮的商业质感，具有氛围深度与强烈对比。构图具备病毒式传播潜力，品牌标志无缝融入场景，下方干净利落地放置一句时尚现代的标语。整体呈现高端大片级广告美学。
description: 超写实渲染，戏剧光影与动态粒子交织，打造极具冲击力的品牌高能瞬间。

title: 折纸蓝图角色：Nano Banana Pro
prompts: A hyper-detailed folded-paper blueprint of [character], where the character is constructed from precise geometric folds and crease lines, overlaid with subtle blueprint markings, measurement lines, and paper annotations. Minimal color palette, off-white paper with faint ink lines. Studio lighting, crisp shadows, architectural art style, photorealistic paper detail. 1080x1080 square format.
一张超精细的折纸蓝图风格的[角色]，角色由精确的几何折叠和折痕线构成，叠加了细微的蓝图标记、测量线和纸质注释。采用极简配色，米白色纸张配以淡墨线条。影棚灯光，清晰锐利的阴影，建筑艺术风格，逼真的纸张细节。1080x1080 正方形格式。
description: 超精细折纸风格角色，融合几何折叠与建筑蓝图元素，米白纸张配淡墨线条，细节逼真。

title: 微型3D载具收藏展示
prompts:
Present a clear, 45° top-down isometric miniature 3D diorama of the iconic vehicle [VEHICLE NAME].

The vehicle is the main focus, placed on a small raised diorama-style base that reflects its most recognizable environment
(e.g. road, runway, ocean, space, racetrack), with subtle contextual details and tiny stylized figures if appropriate.

Use soft refined textures, realistic PBR materials, and gentle cinematic lighting.
The vehicle should feel premium, collectible, and instantly recognizable at a glance.

Use a clean solid [BACKGROUND COLOR] background with no gradients.

At the top-center, display “[VEHICLE NAME]” in large bold text.
Directly beneath it, display a short descriptor in medium text (e.g. “Iconic Movie Car”, “World’s Fastest Train”).
Optionally place an official logo or emblem below the text.

All text must automatically match background contrast (white or black).
Composition: perfectly centered, square 1080x1080, ultra-clean high-clarity diorama aesthetic.

呈现一个清晰的45°俯视等距微型3D立体模型，主角为标志性载具[VEHICLE NAME]。

该载具是画面焦点，置于一个小型抬高的立体模型基座上，基座体现其最具辨识度的环境（例如道路、跑道、海洋、太空、赛道），并配有微妙的环境细节和适当的小型风格化人偶。

使用柔和精致的纹理、逼真的PBR材质和柔和的电影级灯光。  
载具应呈现出高级感、收藏品质感，并能一眼被认出。

背景为纯色[BACKGROUND COLOR]，无渐变。

顶部中央以大号粗体文字显示“[VEHICLE NAME]”。  
其正下方以中等字号显示简短描述（例如“经典电影座驾”、“全球最快列车”）。  
可选择在文字下方放置官方标志或徽章。

所有文字需自动匹配背景对比度（白色或黑色）。  
构图：完美居中，方形1080x1080，极致干净、高清晰度的立体模型美学。
description: 精致等距3D模型，聚焦标志性载具与微缩环境，呈现电影级质感与高级收藏美学。

title: Ned的赛博朋克夜行
prompts:
Is multi-image storytelling grids possible for Grok Imagine? It seems so. I got inspired by the Nano Banana pro+Claude posts ive been seeing of this trend. Tried this with Grok, about a pixar like style telling the story of Ned, cyberpunk setting, he walks through the city. Deets:

A single cohesive image divided into a clean 3x3 grid with thin white borders, telling a sequential story of a young Pixar-style cyberpunk protagonist named Ned traveling through a bustling futuristic city at night. Character consistency: Ned is a teenage boy with messy brown hair, large expressive green eyes, freckles, wearing a worn oversized hoodie with glowing circuit patterns, cargo pants, and sneakers, with the same exact appearance in every panel. Style: Highly detailed Pixar/Disney animation style, smooth CGI rendering, vibrant saturated colors, dramatic cinematic lighting with neon blues, pinks, and purples reflecting on wet surfaces, subtle lens flares, volumetric god rays from holograms and headlights. Grid layout and story progression (top left to bottom right, reading order): 1. Wide establishing shot: Ned standing on a rainy rooftop overlooking the massive cyberpunk city skyline filled with towering skyscrapers, flying cars, giant holographic billboards, and neon signs. 2. Medium shot: Ned leaping from rooftop to rooftop, cape-like hoodie flapping in the wind, determined expression. 3. Close-up: Ned landing on a lower platform, looking curious at a glowing street food vendor drone hovering nearby. 4. Wide shot: Ned walking through a crowded neon-lit street market, people and aliens around him, steam rising from food stalls, rain falling. 5. Medium shot: Ned stopping to watch a massive holographic advertisement of a futuristic band performing in mid-air. 6. Action shot: Ned running through an alley as police drones fly overhead, dramatic low-angle view. 7. Close-up: Ned's face in profile, reflective and thoughtful, city lights reflecting in his eyes. 8. Medium shot: Ned climbing a fire escape ladder toward a higher platform. 9. Final wide shot: Ned reaching the top, standing triumphantly with arms outstretched, the entire sprawling cyberpunk city glowing below him under a stormy sky. Aspect ratio 16:9, ultra-detailed, masterpiece, best quality.

多图像叙事网格对Grok Imagine来说可能吗？看起来是的。我从Nano Banana pro+Claude发布的帖子中得到了灵感，看到了这一趋势。尝试用Grok讲述一个皮克斯风格的故事，关于Ned——在一个赛博朋克设定中穿行城市的主角。细节如下：

一个单一连贯的图像被分成一个干净的3x3网格，带有细白边，讲述了名叫Ned的年轻皮克斯风格赛博朋克主角在夜晚穿越繁华未来城市的故事。角色一致性：Ned是一个有着凌乱棕色头发、大而富有表现力的绿色眼睛、雀斑的少年，穿着带有发光电路图案的旧宽松连帽衫、工装裤和运动鞋，在每个面板中外观完全相同。风格：高度详细的皮克斯/迪士尼动画风格，平滑的CGI渲染，鲜艳饱和的颜色，戏剧性的电影照明效果，霓虹蓝、粉和紫色反射在湿润的表面上，微妙的镜头光晕，全息图和车头灯发出的体积神光线。网格布局和故事进展（从左上到右下，按阅读顺序）：1. 广阔的建立场景：Ned站在雨中的屋顶上俯瞰巨大的赛博朋克城市天际线，充满高耸的摩天大楼、飞行汽车、巨型全息广告牌和霓虹灯标志。2. 中景镜头：Ned从一个屋顶跃向另一个屋顶，斗篷般的连帽衫随风飘动，表情坚定。3. 近景镜头：Ned降落在一个较低的平台上，好奇地看着附近漂浮的发光街头食品贩卖无人机。4. 宽镜头：Ned穿过拥挤的霓虹灯照亮的街市，周围有人和其他外星生物，食物摊位冒着蒸汽，雨水落下。5. 中景镜头：Ned停下观看空中表演的未来乐队的巨大全息广告。6. 动作镜头：Ned跑过一条小巷，警察无人机在其上方飞过，采用戏剧性的低角度视角。7. 近景镜头：Ned的侧面轮廓，映射出沉思的表情，城市灯光在他眼中反射。8. 中景镜头：Ned攀爬消防梯到达更高的平台。9. 最终宽镜头：Ned到达顶部，双手展开站立，显得胜利，整个扩展的赛博朋克城市在他下方发光，天空中雷电交加。比例为16:9，超详细，杰作，最佳质量。
description: 皮克斯风格少年Ned穿越霓虹雨夜都市，9格连贯叙事展现其冒险旅程。

title: Neon Monument: Futuristic Brand Facade
prompts:
A perfectly, mathematically straight-on, direct frontal architectural photograph taken precisely at eye-level at night. The composition is an orthographic view, with zero perspective distortion, presenting the scene as a perfectly flat geometric elevation. 
It captures a monumental, highly sculptural 3D neon commercial sign mounted dead center on a futuristic \"smart\" building facade. 
The facade is composed of textured dark metallic cladding with visible weathering (oxidized patina, rain streaks), integrated with subtle, slow-pulsing [ADAPTIVE_TONE] architectural LED accent strips that complement the sign's color temperature.

// 1. BRAND NAME SECTION (Intelligent Scaling)

The brand name section at the top features the **complete and full sequence** of the large Chinese characters \"[INPUT_BRAND_NAME]\". **All characters provided must be clearly rendered without any truncation or abbreviation.** They are arranged horizontally across the upper section, constructed as **deep, extruded metal channel letters** (depth: [AUTO_DEPTH]cm based on name length) housing **[AUTO_LAYER_COUNT] stacked layers of exposed glass neon tubes**. These tubes glow in [INPUT_BRAND_COLOR], encased behind thick, clear textured acrylic plates (visible micro-scratches, slight frosting) that create complex light refractions, chromatic aberration at edges, and immense depth viewed directly from the front. Character spacing: [AUTO_KERNING] for optimal readability.

// 2. LOGO EMBLEM (Dynamic Sizing)

To the right is a **protruding, dimensional emblem logo** (size: [AUTO_LOGO_SIZE] relative to brand name length) incorporating \"[INPUT_LOGO_DESCRIPTION]\". It features [INPUT_LOGO_COLOR] neon outlines with backlighting that makes it float off the background surface. Logo mounting includes visible polished chrome stand-offs with bolt details.

// 3. CATEGORY TEXT (Smart Line Breaking)

Directly below, the category text \"[INPUT_CATEGORY_NAME]\" is rendered in **thick, stacked layers of [INPUT_CATEGORY_COLOR] neon tubes** set deep within raw, brushed metal channels (visible weld seams). If category text exceeds 6 characters, it automatically splits into two lines with balanced character distribution. Provides strong, heavy industrial contrast with [AUTO_CONTRAST_LEVEL] intensity.

// 4. ENGLISH/TAGLINE (Floating Typography)

At the bottom, the English text \"[INPUT_ENGLISH_TEXT]\" is in smaller **single-line [INPUT_ACCENT_COLOR] neon tubes** mounted on a raised transparent acrylic support bar (8mm thickness, visible edge lighting), giving a floating appearance. Font weight adjusts to [AUTO_WEIGHT] based on text length.

// 5. ADVANCED MATERIAL DETAILS

The entire structure emphasizes heavy industrial 3D construction with realistic weathering:
- **Metal Framework:** Visible thick steel framing with oxidized copper patina, exposed bolt heads (M12 hex), TIG weld seams with slight discoloration
- **Chrome Stand-offs:** Polished mirror-finish mounting hardware with Fresnel reflections and subtle fingerprint smudges
- **Wiring Conduits:** Exposed flexible metal conduits with cable strain relief clamps, proper bend radius
- **Acrylic Enclosures:** 12mm thick cast acrylic with UV yellowing simulation, micro-scratches from maintenance, slight warping from heat
- **Neon Tubes:** Borosilicate glass tubes (15mm diameter) with electrode glow at ends, slight gas color shift indicating age (argon blue aging to subtle purple tint)

// 6. ENHANCED LIGHTING PHYSICS

The intense multi-colored glow interacts with the environment through advanced light physics:
- **Volumetric Scattering:** Atmospheric haze with Rayleigh scattering (blue light scatter) and Mie scattering (larger particle glow)
- **HDR Bloom:** Physically accurate bloom with inverse-square falloff, creating star-burst effects on brightest neon sections
- **Chromatic Aberration:** Slight RGB color separation visible at high-contrast edges of neon tubes
- **Fresnel Reflections:** Angle-dependent specular highlights on chrome hardware and wet metallic facade
- **Caustics:** Complex light patterns from textured acrylic refracting onto metallic cladding
- **Ambient Occlusion:** Contact shadows where sign mounts to facade, enhancing depth perception
- **Light Bleed:** [INPUT_BRAND_COLOR] light spilling onto adjacent LED strips, creating color temperature mixing zones
- **Rain Effect (Optional):** Water droplets on facade creating lens effect, light streaks, and enhanced reflections

// 7. ATMOSPHERIC CONTEXT

The atmosphere is bustling urban technological at night with:
- Distant city glow creating ambient light pollution (warm orange sky gradient)
- Subtle steam/mist rising from street level
- Lens flare from brightest neon elements
- Sharp specular highlights across architectural surface
- [AUTO_WEATHER_MOOD]: Clear/Misty/Light Rain based on brand personality

// 8. TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

- **Resolution:** 8K (7680×4320) for maximum detail
- **Color Space:** Wide-gamut HDR (Rec. 2020)
- **Camera Simulation:** Hasselblad H6D-400c MS, 80mm lens, f/11, ISO 400, 2-second exposure
- **Lighting Setup:** Ambient night exposure + neon practical lighting
- **Post-Processing:** Minimal color grading to preserve neon color accuracy
- **Aspect Ratio:** 【9:16 (vertical/portrait orientation) 】
description: A hyper-detailed, orthographic night shot of a futuristic building with a monumental 3D neon sign, glowing Chinese characters, and industrial textures under urban atmospheric haze.

prompts:
Studio portrait of one smiling person holding a Fanta orange aluminum can close to the camera, with both the can and the person’s head in the foreground. Shot using an ultra-wide fisheye lens for a playful, energetic, immersive perspective.
The model wears a glossy vibrant orange puffer jacket inspired by Fanta branding, layered over a bright white t-shirt.
Background in a bold citrus-orange gradient with subtle yellow highlights, perfectly color-matched to Fanta’s brand palette, smooth modern transitions.
Diffused cinematic studio lighting, juicy highlights on the can, soft glossy reflections on the jacket, gentle shadows for depth.
Slightly desaturated yet fresh, youthful modern editorial style, fun soda-campaign aesthetic, clean and minimal composition.
Ultra-sharp focus, natural skin texture, cheerful expressive smile, high-end commercial beverage photography look.

Face must match the attached reference image exactly, accurate facial proportions, realistic skin tone, no facial alteration.
Photorealistic, 8K detail, professional studio photography, global soda brand advertisement quality.

采用漫射式电影级影棚布光，罐体呈现多汁感高光，夹克表面有柔和光泽反射，辅以细腻阴影增强立体感。

整体色调略去饱和却清新自然，风格年轻现代，具有趣味汽水广告的视觉美学，构图干净简洁。

画面超锐利对焦，保留自然肌肤纹理，表情欢快生动，呈现高端商业饮料摄影质感。

面部必须与所附参考图像完全一致，五官比例准确，肤色真实，不得对面部进行任何修改。

写实风格，8K细节，专业影棚摄影水准，全球汽水品牌广告级品质。

title: 动感体育海报
prompts:
[PERSON] , presented as a direct uncompressed digital screen export of a flat source graphic file.

Technical & Composition Rules:

Medium (Crucial): This is native digital pixel art, NOT a photograph. The entire canvas from edge to edge is pure, seamless digital white (RGB 255,255,255). There is ZERO physical reality: no paper grain, no ink texture, no frame, no shadows, no lighting gradients, no desk/wall environment. It is a flat 2D digital rendering meant for screen display only.

Graphic Container & Color: A central, vertical, solid-color rectangle acts as a digital vector container. The color must be uniquely distinct and semantically relevant to the subject (e.g., David Beckham = classic England white/red or Man Utd red; Prince = Purple). Avoid defaulting to generic red unless justified by primary branding.

Subject Element: A high-detail, gritty black-and-white photograph of the subject is digitally masked inside and over the colored rectangle container. The subject is cropped from the chest up, preferably in a side profile or dynamic 3/4 angle. The head slightly overlaps the top edge of the colored container.

Typography (Digital Text Elements):

Last Name: Placed below the colored container in the white digital space. Rendered in a tall, compressed, bold sans-serif digital font. Color matches the container.

First Name (Contrast Rule): Layered over the subject's torso/clothing. Rendered in a loose, handwritten "signature" script style. The color matches the container, BUT it must be perfectly legible. Ensure high contrast against the underlying B&W photo pixels.

No text covers the face.

Header Element: Centered at the very top in the white digital space, place a small, iconic logo strictly associated with the subject (or their clean uppercase initials if no logo exists), matched to the container's color.

[人物], 以未压缩的直接数字屏幕导出形式呈现，源自平面源图形文件。

技术与构图规则：

媒介（至关重要）：这是原生数字像素艺术，不是照片。整个画布从边缘到边缘都是纯白色（RGB 255,255,255），无缝连接。没有物理现实元素：无纸张纹理、无墨水质感、无边框、无阴影、无光线渐变、无桌面/墙壁环境。它是为屏幕显示设计的纯2D数字渲染。

图形容器与颜色：中央垂直的单色矩形作为数字矢量容器。颜色必须独特且语义上与主题相关（例如，大卫·贝克汉姆=经典的英格兰白/红或曼联红；普林斯=紫色）。除非有主要品牌依据，否则避免默认使用通用红色。

主题元素：高细节的黑白照片被数字化遮罩放置在彩色矩形容器内及之上。主题是从胸部以上裁剪的，最好是在侧面轮廓或动态3/4角度。头部略微超出彩色容器的顶部边缘。

字体（数字文本元素）：

姓氏：置于彩色容器下方的白色数字空间中，采用高大、压缩、粗体的无衬线数字字体。颜色与容器匹配。

名字（对比规则）：覆盖在主体的躯干/衣物部分，采用宽松的手写“签名”风格脚本字体。颜色与容器相同，但必须确保清晰可读。保证与下面的黑白照片像素形成高对比度。

文字不可覆盖脸部。

标题元素：在最顶部中心位置，在白色数字空间中放置一个与主题严格相关的标志性小图标（如果不存在图标，则使用干净的大写首字母），颜色与容器相匹配。
description: 融合未来科技与运动激情的现代体育海报，以纳米香蕉为视觉焦点，充满能量与速度感。

title: AI时尚短片创作流程
prompts:
摄影机在摇臂上缓慢平稳地下降

5. 使用 @ReflctWillie 开发的速度曲线工具使用预设调整每个片段的播放节奏，最后拼接成完整视频。
对比在传统剪辑软件慢慢调试实在方便太多。

自从有了 AI 之后，每个人都可以高效地开发出解决痛点的小工具，让我们可以把更多精力投入到创意本身，而不是被技术细节困住，这个转变真的很棒。

title: 巴黎幻境：屏幕中的埃菲尔
prompts:
👇

A SURREAL TRAVEL-THEMED DIGITAL ARTWORK DEPICTING A HAND HOLDING A SLEEK, FRAMELESS SMARTPHONE OR TABLET TILTED AT A 45-DEGREE ANGLE.

THE DEVICE DISPLAYS A HIGH-RESOLUTION IMAGE OF THE EIFFEL TOWER, SEAMLESSLY BLENDING INTO THE REALISTIC LANDSCAPE BEHIND IT. THE EIFFEL TOWER EXTENDS OUT OF THE SCREEN AND RISES INTO THE SKY, CREATING A HYPER-REALISTIC 3D ILLUSION.

HOT AIR BALLOONS FLOAT AROUND THE TOWER, AND WHITE DOVES FLY ACROSS A SOFT GOLDEN SUNSET SKY. THE BOLD TEXT "PARIS" APPEARS IN THE CLOUDS BEHIND THE TOWER IN A DOUBLE-EXPOSURE STYLE, USING A CLEAN,

MODERN SANS-SERIF FONT.

THE OVERALL STYLE IS DREAMY,

PHOTOREALISTIC, AND VIBRANT - PERFECT FOR A LUXURY TRAVEL CAMPAIGN OR SOCIAL MEDIA ADVERTISEMENT

如下：

一幅超现实旅行主题的数字艺术作品，描绘一只手以45度角倾斜握持一部时尚无边框的智能手机或平板电脑。

设备屏幕上显示着一张高分辨率的埃菲尔铁塔图像，与背后的现实景观无缝融合。埃菲尔铁塔从屏幕中延伸而出，直插云霄，营造出逼真的3D错觉。

热气球在铁塔周围漂浮，白鸽飞过柔和的金色日落天空。铁塔后方的云层中，以双重曝光风格呈现醒目的“PARIS”字样，采用干净现代的无衬线字体。

整体风格梦幻、写实且色彩鲜明，非常适合用于高端旅行宣传或社交媒体广告。
description: 超现实数字艺术展现屏幕内外融合的巴黎奇景，热气球与白鸽共舞于金色日落。

The folds capture the character’s iconic features, outfit, and silhouette in a simplified geometric form. Placed on a clean studio surface with soft shadows. Minimalist collectible art style, photorealistic detail, sharp focus. 1080x1080 square format.

title: Nano Banana Pro：建筑灵感智能小工具
prompts:
Step 1: Select 3 famous architectural landmarks of a random country
Step 2: Deeply analyze geometry, structural principles, material appearances, proportions, and symbolic features.
Step 3: Scale concepts down dramatically and fuse elements into 9 distinct everyday high-tech home or personal devices (kitchen, desk, wellness, garden).
Step 4: Ensure each invention solves a real 2025 consumer pain point with smart features (app control, sustainability, modularity).
Step 5: Produce a 3x3 grid of premium product photography on relevant surfaces (marble counter, oak desk), shallow DOF, luxurious lighting, catchy inventive names underneath. Include subtle UI glows or motion hints for functionality. include names

步骤1：随机选择一个国家的3座著名建筑地标  
步骤2：深入分析其几何结构、构造原理、材质外观、比例关系及象征性特征  
步骤3：将这些概念大幅缩小，并融合成9款独特的日常高科技家居或个人设备（涵盖厨房、书桌、健康、园艺等场景）  
步骤4：确保每项发明都能通过智能功能（如App控制、可持续性、模块化设计）解决2025年消费者的真实痛点  
步骤5：生成一个3x3网格的高端产品摄影图，置于相关背景表面（如大理石台面、橡木书桌），采用浅景深与奢华灯光，并在每件产品下方添加富有创意且朗朗上口的名称。画面中需包含微妙的UI光效或动态提示以体现功能性。
description: 融合全球地标建筑精髓，打造9款解决2025生活痛点的智能微型设备，奢华摄影呈现未来家居科技。

title: 异形2微缩对决
prompts:
I know this prompt has been posted already but I've not seen it done on movies. Here are 2 examples. The parts of the prompt you need to edit are in (BOLD)

Present a clear, 45° top-down isometric miniature 3D cartoon scene of the iconic scene of (RIPLEY IN THE POWER LOADER BATTLING ALIEN QUEEN) from (ALIENS), with soft refined textures, realistic PBR materials, and gentle lifelike lighting.

Create a small raised diorama-style base that includes the most recognisable elements of this scene, along with tiny stylised characters if needed (no facial details).

Use a clean solid (SULACO SHIP GREY) background.

At the top center, display (ALIENS) in large bold text, directly beneath it show (RIPLEY VS. QUEEN) in medium text, and place the official logo associated with (ALIENS) below the subtext.

All text must automatically match the background contrast (white or black).

Composition: perfectly centered layout, square 1080x1080, ultra-clean, high-clarity diorama aesthetic.

我知道这个提示词已经有人发过，但我还没见过用于电影场景。以下是两个示例。需要你修改的部分已用（加粗）标出。

呈现一个清晰的、45°俯视等距微型3D卡通场景，展现（《异形2》中蕾普莉驾驶动力装载机大战异形女王）的经典场面，采用柔和精细的纹理、逼真的PBR材质和柔和自然的光照。

在顶部中央以大号粗体显示（《异形2》），其正下方以中等字号显示（蕾普莉 VS 女王），并在副标题下方放置与（《异形2》）相关的官方标志。

所有文字必须自动匹配背景对比度（白色或黑色）。

构图：完全居中布局，方形1080x1080，极致干净，高清晰度微缩模型美学。

prompts: A cinematic 3×3 grid presenting multiple camera angles of the same female subject outdoors at dusk. A young woman wearing a patterned black shirt stands beside a car on a rural road, surrounded by open fields and distant hills. Each frame shows a distinct shot: extreme close-up, medium shot, over-the-shoulder, wide shot, high-angle top-down, low-angle, profile, three-quarter rear view, and full back view. Natural blue-hour lighting, soft sky gradients, realistic colors, shallow depth of field, cinematic framing. Consistent subject appearance across all frames, film-still aesthetic, professional cinematography reference sheet style, ultra-realistic photography.

一组电影风格的 3×3 网格图像，展示同一女性主体在黄昏户外的多个拍摄角度。一位身穿黑色印花衬衫的年轻女子站在乡间道路旁的一辆汽车边，四周是开阔的田野和远处的山丘。每个画面呈现不同的镜头视角：特写、中景、过肩镜头、广角镜头、高角度俯拍、低角度仰拍、侧面、四分之三后侧视角以及完全背面视角。采用自然的蓝调时刻光线、柔和的天空渐变、真实色彩、浅景深和电影式构图。所有画面中人物形象保持一致，具有电影剧照美学，参考专业电影摄影参考表风格，超写实摄影效果。
description: 蓝调时刻下，一位女子在乡间车旁以9种电影镜头视角呈现，融合自然光影与超写实摄影美学。
